274b2(mdo 'grel): sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa// du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams rgyan par byed// nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs bkod pa'i gdugs// dar gyi lnga ldib dan rab sbyangs shing // dril g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung
274b3(mdo 'grel): sgregs pa// de bzhin gshegs baM kyi dbu la de dag 'dzin lag pa'i mthil nas mchod pa bsam yas rnams// rgyal ba gcig la mchod pa byed pa ltar// rgyal ba ma lus kun la'ang de bzhin te/ drang srong
274b4(mdo 'grel): ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// de dag 'gro ba sdud pa'i ye shes kyis// rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing // bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi bsgo// thabs stong drag gis sems can
274b5(mdo 'grel): 'dul bar byed// kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang // sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang // sbyangs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun tu sgo dang // bzod pa mi zad mi 'khrug sgo dag dang
274b6(mdo 'grel): kha cig brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson sgo dang // bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang // don la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang // spyod pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang // tshangs pa'i gnas pa
275a1(mdo 'grel): ngag dang mngon shes sgo// bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang // bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang // bden dang rten dang rnam thar sgo dag dang // kha cig
275a2(mdo 'grel): stobs dbang po lam sgro dang // nyan thos theg pas rnam par grol sgro dang // rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang // theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang // kha cig mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo//
275a3(mdo 'grel): kha cig bdag med srog med sgo dag dang // mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang // zhi 'gog ting 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul// 'gro ba spyod pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa// de snyed chos kyi sgo li rab zhugs
275a4(mdo 'grel): te// de dag kun du rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang dag kun du rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsam bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag sus kyang
275a5(mdo 'grel): mtshan mar gzung mi nus// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de 'dra'o// de dag dga'i ba'i bkod pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs smin mthun byed pa// dga' bdi spro ba rab dgra' kun ldan+da rnams
275a6(mdo 'grel): bsams shing bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// gang du lo nyes 'jig rten yod byed gang // bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur pa// der ni kun gyi bsam bzhin bya ba yis// sbyin pa sbyin zhing
275b1(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// de dag zas skom mchog dang ro mchog dang // glos dang bgo pa rin chen sna tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed//
275b2(mdo 'grel): brtan pa de dag mchog tu lus spras shing // gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing brgyan byas te// phreng bas brgyan byas cing spros kyi bskus pa yi// gzugs rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul byed//
275b3(mdo 'grel): mthong na dga' tshis rab tu dga' rnams la// blo mchog de dag mchog tu gzugs bzang ba// gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed byed cing // gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed// de
275b4(mdo 'grel): dag ka la ping ka'i sgra sbyin dang // khyu byug kun la dang pa'i sgra skad dang // rnga dang tshangs dang mi 'am ci yi sgras// mos pa kun lho de bzhin chos kyang ston// stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas//
275b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o// chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis// bsum pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don dang gnod pa'i grogs
275b6(mdo 'grel): kyang de bzhin byed// bya ba kun la grogs su 'gyur byas shing // grogs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed// sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon rnams la// grogs kyi don du de dag bzod
276a1(mdo 'grel): @byed cing // 'gro ba kun la phyan yon bde don tu// de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len// gdun sngon byung med cing chos med de// dgon 'gro dang thur pa mi dmigs pa// der ni rgyal srid
276a2(mdo 'grel): 'byor par spangs te// zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag khyim dang 'ching dang sred pa'i gnas// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyurare// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par//
276a3(mdo 'grel): mngon par byung zhing thar pa rab tu brjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams brjod byed cing // skyes chen rnams kyi chos spyod gang yin dang // drang srong rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus par// yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba'i
276a4(mdo 'grel): don rnams byung // gang na sems can dpag med tshe ldan zhing // bde dang ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa// der ni rko bas nyen cing nang bu can// bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston// 'dod chags 'bar
276a5(mdo 'grel): zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la// 'jig rten gti mug me chen rab 'bar zhing // rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab 'bar ba'i don rnams byed// 'jig rten gnas bstan gnas sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag sangs
276a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang / kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid brjod cing cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed// de dag kun bad+mo/
276b1(mdo 'grel): rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas// gzugs kyi byin rlabs stobs kyis thams cad du// de bzhin gash+ye hrI phrul sto/ d+ya / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// de dag thabs tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//
276b2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// 'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+ma bzhin// dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu// de ga snyan dngags mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor// gar mkhan rnga mkhyen
276b3(mdo 'grel): gyad dang rol mo mkhan// bzhugs mdzes rgyan phreng thogs shing gar byed dang // sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs mang kun du sten// grong pa grong dpon kha lo bsgyur bar 'gyur// de bzhin deng dpon tshong
276b4(mdo 'grel): dpon khyim bdag 'gyur// rgyal po blon po mdun 'don pho nya dang // sman pa 'jigs med bstan bcos cho ga mkhan// de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur// sman dang rin mi zad gter
276b5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang // yid bzhin nor bu 'dod sbyin sdong po dang // lam gol dong pa rnams la lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cig/ sems can las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa
276b6(mdo 'grel): de dag kun la rmongs chos tshad thabs dang // sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten brjod par byed// 'tsho meng gnod pa med pa'i sbyor gang // sems can bde byed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa//
277a1(mdo 'grel): rig stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun// drang srong de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod// gang la lhur bcas 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba// drang srong spyod mchog dam pa gang yin
277a2(mdo 'grel): dang // brtul zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub spyod kun kyang / mkhas pas de dag rnams kyi rab tu brjod// de dag spyod can kun rgyu mu steg can// gdung ba go'u te ma dang mi smrar skyed// gcer bu gos med
277a3(mdo 'grel): lhur len dge sbyong la/ mu steg sa can gyi slob dpon mkhas par ston// de dag kun tu 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang // pra na yod dang bla na med rnams dang // ral pa ring dang gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can//
277a4(mdo 'grel): de dag tu yang slob dang ni 'gyur ba yin// nyi ma'i rjes lha dka' thub lnga ldan dang // khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dgas spyod// gre'u can dang mu stegs sum cu pa// de dag tu yang de dge slob dngan
277a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// lhag pa'i shes la 'jug pa dga' rnams dang // mu stegs nyi reg yul du rgyu rnams su// rtsa ba 'bras bu chu sbyang gyur nas kyang // bsam yas ches la de dag dam pa mchog/ cig pur
277a6(mdo 'grel): 'dug dang gcig pur rgyu ba dang // tsher ma rtswa dang thal par nyal ba dang // gang dag gtun shing mal can gnas pa dang // de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji
277b1(mdo 'grel): snyed pa// de dag bsnam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing // bsnyen dka' mi bzang drug shul dka' thub kyis// mu stegs can gyis sdug bsngal spang bar 'dul// 'jig rten lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas//
277b2(mdo 'grel): lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu steg can// kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshul gyis// de dag rnams la bden pa sbyin par byed // la lar 'gro lding ba yi sngags kyi gzhi// shin du gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden
277b3(mdo 'grel): pa ston// la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis// lha la dag la lha yis gsang tshig gis// la la ngag la yi ge dbye tshig dang // don la rnam nges rdo rje gsang rnams dang // rgol ba 'dul bar shes pa'i tshig
277b4(mdo 'grel): rnams dang // bstan bcos thub med thar pa'i tshigs rnams kyis// la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang // kun la 'jug pa 'dis tshig tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la lha yis tshig dang // kru yi dru tshig gnod/
277b5(mdo 'grel): sbyin nges tshig gis// la lar srin po 'byung po shu za dang // dri za grul bum lto 'phye 'phye tshig dang // mi ci lha min na mkha' lding tshig rnams kyis// bden pa bstan cing thar par 'dren par byed// de dgra bden
277b6(mdo 'grel): dang nges tshig tshul shes te// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam byas tshig lam shes par ston// de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro ba mchog gi ting 'dzin//
278a1(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od zer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed// mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /
278a2(mdo 'grel): sems can ji skad 'od zer de shes pa// de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog mA n+ta// mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan cing // chos kyang yongs su bstan de lam
278a3(mdo 'grel): bstan cing // rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan byas pas// nges ni mthong legs 'od zer grub par 'gyur// lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa'o// 'od zer 'od byed ces bya rab gtong zhing // rdul dang mun
278a4(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad bsol byas te// 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang // sems can gang dag 'od nges bsgril byas pa// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzin// de dog rgyal po mchod phyir skyon gzung bas/
278a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar gyur// 'bru mar ma me mar gyi mar me dang // rtswa shing 'dam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang // spos dang bcud lan rin chen sgron ma dang // rgyal ba rnams la phul nas 'od byed thob//
278a6(mdo 'grel): sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhi// sems can gang dag 'od nges bskul byas la// de dag sred spangs srid pa'i rgya mtshos las// sems can sgrol po'i don du go cha gyon// gang dag srid spangs sred pa
278b1(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho las// sems can sgrol ba'i don du go gyon pa// de dag chu bo bzhi las rab tu sgrol// mya ngan med pa'i bde ba'i grong khyer ston// stegs dang zam pa du ma byas pa dang // chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te//
278b2(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags byas pas// des na sgrol ba'i 'od zer grub par gyur// skom pa sel ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom
278b3(mdo 'grel): par rab spangs shing // chos la mos pa'i ro ni don du gnyer// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spang ste/ chos mos ro la don du gnyer gyur pas// bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'jig rten
278b4(mdo 'grel): skom pa'i sred pa rnam par snrel// rdzing dang khron pa chu klung chu rdo dang // mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de// 'dod pa smad cing bsam gtan bsngags byas pas/ des na skom pa sel ba grub par 'gyur// dga' bar
278b5(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i 'od zer rab gang zhing // sems can gang ngag 'od des bskul byas pa// dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du// rang 'byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed ngo // thugs rje ldan pa'i sku gzugs
278b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan brgyan pa// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa rnams byas shing // rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan rnams brjod pa// des nas dga' byed 'od zer grub por 'gyur// mgu bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab btong zhing /
279a1(mdo 'grel): sems can gang dag 'od nges bskul byas pa// rtag tu sangs rgyas la ni dga' mgu zhing // chos la dgu' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu'o// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dga' mgu zhing //
279a2(mdo 'grel): chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu nas// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams dang // rtag tu 'grogs thob bzod pa bla med 'theb// sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog pa// sems can
279a3(mdo 'grel): mang po bskul cing dran byas te// byang chub sems kyi yon tan rab brjod pas// des na mgu byed 'od zer grub par 'gyur// bsod nams bsags pa 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des
279a4(mdo 'grel): bskul byas pa// bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing // sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma sbyin par byed// gtan pa med pa'i chos sbyin de byed che// slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byed de// bsam pa thams
279a5(mdo 'grel): cad sbyin pa byin byas pas// bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer rab grub par gyur// ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gdag 'ong nges bskul byas po// chos gcig sgo mo nas
279a6(mdo 'grel): ni du ma yi// chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyi khong du chud // chos kyi dbye ba sems can 'dzin btsud de// don la nges pa'i ye shes rnams phye zhing // chos kyi tshig don brjid po byas pa na// des na ye shes
279b1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i 'od zer 'grub/ shes rab sgron ma'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung zhing // rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ bdag
279b2(mdo 'grel): po med chos stong pa byed med pa// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs 'dra zhing // rmi lam mtshungs la gzugs brnyan 'dra ba dag/ bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub po// chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer gtong zhing //
279b3(mdo 'grel): sems can gang dag 'od des bsku la byis pa// mi zad mdzod kyis gzungs ni thob gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzad kyang 'dzin// chos 'dzin rnams la yongs su phan btags te// drang srong
279b4(mdo 'grel): rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing // 'gro ba chos kyi rjesu gzung byas pas// chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer grub par gyur// gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur pa gtong zhing // sems n+dan
279b5(mdo 'grel): 'jungs pa gang ngag ngos bskul bas// longs spyod mi rtag mi brten shes gyur nas// de dag rtag tu gAtong la dga' mos 'gyur// ma dul gdul dka'i sems can ser sna can// nor rnams rmi lam
279b6(mdo 'grel): sprin dang 'dra shes nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis po sbyin pa spel byas pas// des na gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od grub po// yongs su gdung meng 'od zer gtong zhing // khrims 'tshil sems can gang dag
280a1(mdo 'grel): nges bskul pa// tshul khrims rnams par dag la gnas gyur nas// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed ngo // dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang // tshul khrims la
280a2(mdo 'grel): yang sems can mang 'dzud cing // byang chub sems kyang yang ngag 'dzin bcug pas// yongs gdung meng ba'i 'od zer de grub bo// bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // mi bzod sems can gang dgra
280a3(mdo 'grel): des bskul ba// khro dang tha ba nga rgyal yongs su spongs shing // de ni rtag tu bzod mos dga' bar 'gyur// sdig ldan rnams kyis nyes byas bzod byas te// byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing // bzod
280a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i yon tan rtag tu bsngags brjod pas// des na bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od grub bo// brtun par ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // le lo'i sems can gang dag des bskul ba// rigs par brtson pa dkon
280a5(mdo 'grel): mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo ba mang mchod pa byed par 'gyur// rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las rab
280a6(mdo 'grel): 'das te// byang chub bla med myur du rig par 'gyur// sems can mang po brtson 'grus 'dzin bcug ste// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas// zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs bzung bas/
280b1(mdo 'grel): des na brtun par ldan pa'i 'od thob bo// zhi bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gdong zhing // rnam 'khrugs sems can ji snyed nges bskul ba// de dag chags med sdang med rmongs med cing // rtog par gyur nas mnyam
280b2(mdo 'grel): sems su 'gyur// sdig pa'i grog po skyon ldan skyon can dang // 'dre ba yongasu rnam par spangs byas te// de gon par rab zhi bsam gtan rab brjod paskye// des na zhi bar byed pa'i 'od grub po// shes
280b3(mdo 'grel): rab bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // shes rab 'tshal sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chub gyur// nyi ma'i sgrol
280b4(mdo 'grel): ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// shes rab snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste// byang chub don du chos gang bcol byas pa// chos de gus par byas nas
280b5(mdo 'grel): rab bshad pas// shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer de grub po// sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma bsam
280b6(mdo 'grel): rnams// pad+ma dam pa rnams la zhugs par mthong // sangs rgyas che dang sangs rgyas rnam thar dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas brjod byas shing // sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rab brjod pas
281a1(mdo 'grel): des na sangs rgyas ldan pa'i grub bo// mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // 'jigs gnyen sems can gang la des reg pa// 'byung po bza' dang gsang brdeg
281a2(mdo 'grel): bcing ba dang // nad 'go 'jigs pa kun las thar par 'gyur// mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can gang bskyabs dang // srog chags gsod las bzlog par byas pa dang // 'jigs pa skyabs tshol rnams
281a3(mdo 'grel): la skyabs byas pas// mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer de grub bo// bde ba kun byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing // nad pa na ba gang dag nges reg pa// rnam pa kun tu nad kyi sdug bsal thar// bsam gtan ting
281a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin bang po rnams kyang 'thob// nang gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang // rin chen bcud len spos dang byug pa dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang // 'bru mir zas skom byin pa dri thob bo// sangs
281a5(mdo 'grel): rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // tshe zad tha mar ma gang dag nges bskul ba// sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'gro/ 'chi
281a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te// dga' byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing // 'chi kar sangs rgyas skyabs su btang brjod pas// sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer thob bo// chos rab
281b1(mdo 'grel): brjod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bsgral byas pa// chos nyan klog cing yi ger 'dri bar byed// de dag rtag tu chos la dga' mos 'gyur// chos kyi mu ge byung tshe chos brjod//
281b2(mdo 'grel): chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing // 'dun pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis zhes// brjod pas chos rab brjod pa de thob bo// sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir// dbyangs dang ldan pa'i
281b3(mdo 'grel): 'od/ TIr rab gtong zhing // 'jig rten gang nga gsum na sgra rgyun ji snyed pa// kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos// glasang bstod smr-i yi drang srong che bstod de// rgyal ba'i gsung sgro don du sil snyan dang //
281b4(mdo 'grel): sgra chen dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la// rab tu bsngags pas dbyung sa ldan 'od grub bo// 'chi meng sbyin pa'i 'od zer rabo gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od dris bskul byas pa// bag med spyod pa tham rab sku
281b5(mdo 'grel): tI/ yon tan kun la brtson pa nyams su phyin// 'dus byas rtag tu bde bi med pa ste// sdug bsngal 'tshe ba du mas yongs su gang+gA// 'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi spyod ces// brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de
281b6(mdo 'grel): bo// khyad par ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi tshul khrims khyad par dang // ting 'dzin khyad par shes rab khyad par TI gro/ thub chen
282a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po khrims kyis mchog gyur cing // ting 'dzin mchog dang shes rab mchog gyur ces// byang chub don du bstod cing bsngags sa/ des khyad par ldan pa'i 'od grub bo// rin chen
282a2(mdo 'grel): bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od nges bskul byas pa// rin chen mi zad gter rnams thob gyur nas// drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten rin
282a3(mdo 'grel): phul// skye bo nyon mongs rin chen rnams kyis bsdus// rgyal ba rnams le rin chen rab phul bas// rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur// spros rab snang ba'i sde 'od rabya gtong zhing // sems can gang
282a4(mdo 'grel): dag 'od ngos bskul byas pas// mi la med spros yid 'ong tsher gyur nas// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur// mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis// mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te// spos
282a5(mdo 'grel): las rgyal ba'i gzugs dang mchod dag rten dag/ byas pas spos rab snang ba de grub bo// sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang // sil snyan
282a6(mdo 'grel): bslags shing spos kyi bdug pa yis// pho brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog bkram// sil snyen dag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing // me tog bdug pa bdug spos phye ma dang // rgyal mtshal mtshan pa den 'am
282b1(mdo 'grel): mchog rnams kyis mchod// des na sna tshogs bkod par grub par gyur// shin du dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed// mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams sbyang byas
282b2(mdo 'grel): bsdu// de na shin tu dang byed 'od grub bo// sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun tu gnas// mchod rten 'khor ba sar spos kyis chus btab pas// sprin dang ldan
282b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'od der rab tu 'thob// lhab lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // gcer bu gos gyon rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur// gos dang go ba rgyan phreng sna tshogs dag/ sbyin pa byas pas lhab lhub pa bkod pa grub
282b4(mdo 'grel): ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // bkres pa kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur// zas dang skom dang ro mchog sna tshogs rnams// byin pas ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od grub bo// nor rnams ston pa'i
282b5(mdo 'grel): 'od zer rab gtong zhing // dbul po dag gis rin chen gter rnams 'thob/ dkon mchog gsum la gter gzhi mi zad pa// dbul ba byas pos nor ston 'od thob bo// mig rnam skyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong
282b6(mdo 'grel): zhing // de tshe long bas sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong // rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// mar me phul bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub// rna ba rnam sbyod 'od zer rab gtong zhing // rna ba nyams
283a1(mdo 'grel): pas sgra mang thos par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// sil spyan phul bsasna skyong 'od grub bo// sna rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sngon chad
283a2(mdo 'grel): ma mtshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur// rgyal ba rnam dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// spros rab phul bas sna sbyong 'od zer grub// lce rnam sbyod ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyi sangs rgyas
283a3(mdo 'grel): bstod// mi snyan brlang bar smra ba rnams spongs te// 'jam dpal slu bas lce skyong 'od zer grub// lus rnam spyod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // dbang po nyams pa dang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams
283a4(mdo 'grel): dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// lus gtugs brus pas lus rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // myos pa thams cad sems dang ldan par 'gyur// ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas pas na// sems
283a5(mdo 'grel): spyod pa yi 'od zer de grubo// gzugs rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rapo gtong zhing // mi dbang rnams kyi bsam yas sku mthong ste// sku gzugs rin mo sna tshogs mang po dang // mchod rten byas pas gzugs
283a6(mdo 'grel): sbyong 'od grub bo// sgra rnam spyod po'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes// rkyen la byung bas brag cha 'dra'o zhes// sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub po// dri rnam sbyong ba'i 'od
283b1(mdo 'grel): zar rab gtong zhing // dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dgra/ khrus byas byang chub zhing gi 'od de yin// ro blo sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur//
283b2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la// ro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin// rog rnam sbyang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // reg nA rtsub pa 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur// mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri
283b3(mdo 'grel): mang chen char phreng ba 'jam pa pad+ma ut+pal 'gyur// bcos bu'i ras mang 'dza zhing reg pa de rnams// rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul bting bkram ste// me tog byug be na bza' 'jam rnams dang // phreng
283b4(mdo 'grel): pa bla re phul ba'i 'od de yis// chos rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // 'jig rten phan mdzad// rgyal ba thams cad kyi// spu rnams kun nas chos rnam bsam mi khyab// byung ba thos nas mos pa
283b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad tshim// rgyun las byung bas ma skyes ngo bo nyid// rgyu lta bu rnams kyi sku ni chos sku ste// chos nyid mkha' bzhin rtag tu gnas so zhes// brjod pas pas chos rnams sbyang par thob par 'gyur//
283b6(mdo 'grel): 'od zer sgo mo de dag l-i sogs pa// drang srong rnams kyi spu yi sgo gcig nas// 'od zer gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ste// kun kyang las sbyor tha dang tshul can no// ji ltar sku yi sku yi sgo gcig nas// 'od zer
284a1(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ba// ma lus spu rnams kun nas de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnams 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// yon tan+da gang gi 'od zer glang 'grub pa'i// yon tan de grogs sngon
284a2(mdo 'grel): chad gang 'gyur bar// de dag nyid las 'od zer rab 'byung ste// drang srong ye shes rnams 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// de dag bsod nams sngon grogs gang yin la// rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus btab dang // gang
284a3(mdo 'grel): gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa// de dag kun gyi 'od zer de dag shes// gang dag bsod nas sa byas shing dge bsags dang // gang dag yang yang sangs rgyas rnams mchod cing // sangs rgyas yon tan
284a4(mdo 'grel): 'dun te don gnyerU ba// de dag kun la 'od zer de dag bskul// dper na dmus long nyi ma mi mthong yang // de med ma yin 'jig rten kun du 'char// migo dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas// kun
284a5(mdo 'grel): kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jugs// de bzhin skye chen 'od zer de dag kun// rab tu byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing // mos nyams phel pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste// blo gros yengs pa rnams
284a6(mdo 'grel): la de dag mos// dper rgyan nor bu gzhon pa gzhal med khang // bcud kyis len dang rin chen byug pa spos// de dge skye bo che la yod mod kyi// phongs par gyur pa rnams la de dag med// de bzhin skyes
284b1(mdo 'grel): chen 'od zer de dag kun// de dag yod kyang log pas nyen gyur cing // mos pa nyams pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste// blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod// gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'dri thos nas/
284b2(mdo 'grel): da cing mos la dang ba skyes gyur nas// bdag ni yon tan che rgyur mi 'gyur zhes// de dgu dang som nyi mi bskyed de// de dge g.yog 'khor bkod pa rnams 'phrul pa// ting 'dzin dam par mngon par grub byed
284b3(mdo 'grel): cing // phyogs bcu kun du do zla mang rnams kyi// zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston par byed// 'od bkod de dag pad+ma sna tshogs pa// stong gsum tshed tsam byin gyis brlabs byas nas// skyi l-i krung
284b4(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'i lus kyis kun khyab ste// ting du 'dzin rnam par 'phrul po 'di 'dra'o// de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+ma gzhan// 'khor dang btsastaM pas byin gyis brlobs byas shing // sangs rgyas sras
284b5(mdo 'grel): kyi thams cad yongs su bskor// de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par gnas// drang srong de yis sems can gang dag rnams// yongs su sbyin byaso+o sangs rgyas legs bsgrub pas// de dag pad+ma
284b6(mdo 'grel): chen po de bskor cing // kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod// gang dag ting 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa// skyes chen rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin to// rang gi slob mas kun kyang yongs bsku
285a1(mdo 'grel): nas// skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba sbyor ba bzhin// de dag ji ltar phyogs cig rab 'jug cing // zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa// de bzhin phyogs rnams ma
285a2(mdo 'grel): lus kun tu ston// ting 'dzin rnams par 'phrul pa 'dri 'dra'o// de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas pa'i// ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub ce byed cing // kha cig mnyam gzhag kho cig ldang bar yang
285a3(mdo 'grel): phyogs rnams kun du rang gi lus ston to// de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam bzhag cing/ nub kyi phyogs su mnyam pa nas dpa' bo rnam par ldang // nub kyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // bdag nyid
285a4(mdo 'grel): chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang // de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug/ gzhan gyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur la// ye shes yon tan phyug po gzhan nus ldang // drang srong ting 'dzin
285a5(mdo 'grel): rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa// grangs med ma lus dog na rang byung ba// de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams// zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang // phyog
285a6(mdo 'grel): der mnyam par bzhag pa brtan byas nas// dpa' do nub kyi zhing rnams ma lus par// rnam par ldang ba'i mngon sum rgyal po kun la// mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang // nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing
285b1(mdo 'grel): rnams gang yin pa// grangs med ma lus dag na zhugs sangs rgyas// de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams// zhi ba ti 'dzin la gnas par snang// phyogs der mnyam par bzhag pa brtan byas nas//
285b2(mdo 'grel): dpa'o shar gyi zhing rnams ma lus par// rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun lo// mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang // de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su// phyogs rnams ma lus kun du brtan la
285b3(mdo 'grel): 'jug/ kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig langs gyur cing // 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang // de dag mig gi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // gzugs kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang //
285b4(mdo 'grel): gzugs rnams bsam gyis mI khyab ston pa na// de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur// gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur la// mig ni ma skyes ma gyur byung rang bzhin te/ stong pa byed
285b5(mdo 'grel): pa med par rab ston cing // mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // dag rna ba'i lam li mnyam gzhag cing // sgra yi lam nus bdag nyid chen po ldang // gAng la lhar bcos 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba//
285b6(mdo 'grel): sgra dang skad rnams kun la rab tu zhugs// sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // rna ba'i lam nas drang ldan rnam par ldang
286a1(mdo 'grel): de dag sna yi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// dri mchog dam pa 'jug par rab tu zhugs//
286a2(mdo 'grel): dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // sna yi lam nas dran ldan+da rnam par ljang / de dag lce yi la ma ma ny-i na ci ga kun gyi'i dz+nyAn
286a3(mdo 'grel): gang du skar btsas 'jig rten mo nges gyur pa// bdag nyid chen po ro mchog rnams la zhugs// ro mchogs rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed par rab
286a4(mdo 'grel): stan cing // lce yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // reg pa'i lam nus bdag nyid chen po ldang // gling du wAr thaHsa 'jig rten pos gyur / jig/ no da skyed rje
286a5(mdo 'grel): bzhugs// reg pa'i lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // lus kyi lam nas dran ldan rna ldang // de dag sems kyi lam
286a6(mdo 'grel): la mnyam gzhag cing // chos kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa// chos la gnas par 'jug pa rab tu zhugs// chos kyi las la mnyam par bzhag gyur
286b1(mdo 'grel): cing // sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// ston pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // sems kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing // lang tsho shugs la gnas
286b2(mdo 'grel): rnams la mnyam gzhag cing // rgas shing 'khog pa'i lus las rnam par ldang // rgas shang 'khog pa'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing // dud pa'i dge bsnyen ma yi lus las ldang // dge bsnyen ma yi
286b3(mdo 'grel): lus las mnyam gzhag cing // dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus las rnam par ldang // ngad pa'i dge bsnyen lus las mnyam gzhag cing // dge slong ma yis lus las rnam par lhung // dge slong ma yi lus la
286b4(mdo 'grel): mnyam gzhag cing // dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus las ldang // dge slong mang thos lus la mnyam gzhag cing // slob dang mi slob lus las rnam par ldang // slob dang mi slob lus la mnyam gzhag
286b5(mdo 'grel): cing / rkyen gyis sangs rgyas lus las rnam par ldang // rkyen gyis sangs rgyas lus la mnyam gzhag cing // sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las rnam par ldeng // sangs rgyas sku mchog rab la mnyam
286b6(mdo 'grel): gzhag cing // lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam par ldeng // lha yis lus gzugs lus gzugs la ni mnyam gzhag cing // rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi lus las ldang // rdzu 'phrul klu yi lus la mnyaM
287a1(mdo 'grel): gzhag cing // rdzu 'phrul chen po gnod sbyin lus las ldang // 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la mnyam gzhag cing // 'byung po kun gyis lus las rnam par ldang // 'byung
287a2(mdo 'grel): po kun gyis lus la mnyam gzhag cing // s+phu yI sgro gcig nas ni rnam par ldang // smre sgo gcig la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // spu sgo gcig la mnyam thams cad las ni rnam par ljang // sgra sgro kun
287a3(mdo 'grel): la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // sgra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par lhung // skye rtse gcig gi khyon+da las mnyam gzhag cing // sku rtse kun gyi khyon las rnam par ldang // sgyu rtsi kun gyi khyon la mnyam
287a4(mdo 'grel): gzhag cing // pra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang // rdul gcig la ni mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // ma lus rdul rnams kun las rnam par ldang // rdul rnams me lus kun la mnyam gzhag cing //
287a5(mdo 'grel): rgyu mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang // rgyu mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam gzhag cing // nor bu'i shing tog dag las rnam pad+ma ljang // shing tog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // rgyu lta bu rnams
287a6(mdo 'grel): gyi 'ang po sgoms ldang // rgyal po'i 'od zer sgra la mnyam gnag cing // sramatshe chu yi chu gang rnams las sdung // rgya mtsho'i chu gleng rnams la mnyas gzhag ci ngas nyid chen khrim wa~M/
287b1(mdo 'grel): las ldang // me yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // rlung gi lam las dran ldan rnam par lhung // rlung gi lam la rna mnyam par bzhag gyur cing / bdag nyid chen pos yi gzhi las ldang // sa yi
287b2(mdo 'grel): gzhi le mnyam par bzhag gyur cing // lha kun gzhal med khang las rnam par ldang // lha kun gzhal med kha nga la mnyam gzhag cing // dran ldan de ni mkha' las rnam par ldang // yon tan mtha' yas
287b3(mdo 'grel): bsags pa de dag gi/ ting 'dzin rnam thar dadag bsam mi khyab// rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su// bshad pa mdzad kyang zad par mdzad mi spyod// 'gro las rnam smin bsam gyis mi khyab ste//
287b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gsungs pa ni// klu yi rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang // bsam byang bsam gtan rnam 'phrul ba dang // bsam byed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag la yang
287b5(mdo 'grel): dbas sngon brjod par bya// de dag 'dra ba'i dpe lta cang med de// mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis// bstan na myur du don rnams shes par 'gyur// rnam thar brgyad kyi dbang la gnas pa yi// nyan
287b6(mdo 'grel): thos gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur// mang por gyur nas phyir yang gcig 'gyur te// mkha' li bsam gtan 'tsha' zhi nga 'bar bar byed// sbrang nas mo 'bar spyod nas chu yi rgyun// stong nas me 'bar smad nas
288a1(mdo 'grel): chu yi rgyun// grong dang 'greng dang nyal dang 'dug dang // lus 'phrul skad cig gcig la bsam mi khyab// de ni snying rje che dang mi ldan zhing // byang chub mi tshel 'dzag rten yal 'dor yang //
288a2(mdo 'grel): lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byung // 'jig rten phan 'dod ci phyir ston mi byed// nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dong zhing // phyogs rnams kun gyi chu yi dogs dag dang // mtsho mtshe'u mtsho bran snod dang rin
288a3(mdo 'grel): chen dang // rgya mtsho chu klung rnams su gzugs brnyan ston// de bzhin gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// skye bu dpa' bo phyogs bcu kun tu ston// ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas// de la de bzhin
288a4(mdo 'grel): gshegs par rang byung dbang // dang ba'i mcho ba'i la yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag/ de dag so so'i rang gis gzugs rnyan mthong // ral gri mnga' tsho ni gzhu dang mda' rnams dang // go gyonu gzhon dang theg par bcasu
288a5(mdo 'grel): mthong // gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang chu byang gang // de dang de dag de ltar chu las mthong // 'on kyang tshul byams snang rnam rtog med// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra ldan
288a6(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba dang // sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes rnams kyis// sgra yi yan lag dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas te// rang gi skad kyi skad kun tshim par byed// zla ldan chags sdang gti mug can de yang // skad rnams
288b1(mdo 'grel): gyis sgra yi tshul mkhas na// gzugs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams// lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu mi byed// tum bu ru yi chung ma dbyangs ldan ma// tshangs pa'i bu mo yid la byung ba de// bden dang dum bcwa
288b2(mdo 'grel): mI 'tshe dga' rnams kyi// sems dang sna yid dang kha yi sgor 'jug ste// dbyings ldan chags bcas zhe sdang can de yang // brtul zhugs grub mthun dbyangs kyi yan lag gis// yid 'ong skad kyis 'jig rten ma
288b3(mdo 'grel): byed na// ye shes yon tan phyug rnams cis mi byed// rig sngags tshul mkhas sgyu me'i mkhan po ni// sku tshegs gzugs mang mtha' yas ston pa byed// nyin mtshan yung dang zla ba lo brgya dang // khyim bzang rgyas
288b4(mdo 'grel): pa shin du mdzes pa ston// 'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang // sgyu mo'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten mgu byed na// bsam gtan mngo ni shes rnam thar rab bslabs pa// spyod tshul mkhas rnams ci phyir mgu
288b5(mdo 'grel): mi byed// lU dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i rmi// rgyal ldan lha yis lha mr-i na pham byas na// de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas gzhon bcas shing // theg bcus dmag+na tsas go gyon bzhin du byung // 'dod
288b6(mdo 'grel): cha gos snang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed no// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' ba rnams// lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed// rdo rje 'chang ba'i gling glang ba'i//
289a1(mdo 'grel): bsrung bu// dbang po'i 'khor gyur rdzu 'phrul chen po de// mgo bo sum cu rtsa gsum mngon sprul zhing // mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste// mche ba de dag so so re re la'ang /
289a2(mdo 'grel): rdzing bu chu gang bdun bdun sprul pa byed// rdzing bu re la 'du yang pad+ma sna tshogs pa// rnam par bkod pa bdun bdun sprul pa byed// pad+ma re re la'ang lha yi bu mo ngag/ rgyu rtsal kun shes bdun bdun sprul pa byed// de dag
289a3(mdo 'grel): rtsed mo gru gar tshul la mkhas// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po dang rtse// gling po de yang lus ni rgyu byas te// lha rnams kun dang grogs shing 'dre bar byed// spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun kyang mthun// glang po mchog
289a4(mdo 'grel): rnam 'phrul de ltar snang // glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang // 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na// shes rab kyis stobs la sbyangs pa rnams// ting 'dzin brgya yis rnam 'phrul cis mi byed//
289a5(mdo 'grel): sgra gcan ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus sprul te// rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa 'jog byed cing // rgya mtsho lte bar phyin pa tsam du smon// ri rab rtsem dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyom// sgra can chags sdang gti mug ldan dri yang
289a6(mdo 'grel): 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na// 'jig rten sngon ma bdun rnams rab 'joms pa// rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci ste ston mi byed// brgya byin rnams 'phrul bsam yas pa la ltos// lha dang lha min dbang /
289b1(mdo 'grel): po g.yul 'gyed tshe// lha myin bye ba 'byer ba ji snyed pa// de skyed brgya byin rang gI lus las sbrul// lha min dbang dang lha min phal kun gyis// brgya byin rang rang mdun du 'jug par shes// de ni rdo rje 'chang bas bzung
289b2(mdo 'grel): ngo zhes// lha myin dbang po kun kyang mgo myos gyur// 'jigs par byed pa'i mig stong rab bstan te// rdo rje me lce 'bar ba thog byed cing // lus la go bgos gzi brjid bsnyen dka' ba'i// brgya byin mthong na
289b3(mdo 'grel): lha min dbang po 'byed// de yang bsod nams phal ba'i mthu stobs kyi// lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed ni// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur pa// bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi 'phrul//
289b4(mdo 'grel): lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga// lha las rnam par smin pas grub par gyur// lha rnams bag med gnas par shes gyur nas// rnga daM na mkha'i las ni sgra sgrogs te// 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag ther zug min
289b5(mdo 'grel): tha shwa la mi brtun dbul ba'i ngo bo nyid// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla tshungs shing sa 'dra// srid pa thams cad rmi lam sprin dang mtshungs// bag med thams cad dgra bcas mya ngan can// 'chi ba'i lam yin mI ba'i lam
289b6(mdo 'grel): ma yin// ji snyed su ngag bag med gnas gyur pa// de dge 'chi bdag chu srin chen pos zin// sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin thams cad yin// skye bo thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyi smad//
290a1(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyi yul la rmongs// chos kyi stobs la rtug dga' gyis zhes bskul// rnga nges bskul nas brgya byin lha rnams dang // lha yi mdun nas chos bzang
290a2(mdo 'grel): 'dug nasu// gtam gang zhi zhing 'dod chags bralnga mthun pa// chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la brjod// ru da gzugs med bstan du mi rung yang // de ltar rnga sgras don chen rab byed na// bsam pa ji bzhin
290a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs ni yongs su ston rnams// 'gro ba kun gyi don chen ci mi byed// lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed che// lha yid bsid nams byed pa'i mthu stobs kyis// lha la sbrul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga/
290a4(mdo 'grel): lha rnams mA 'jigs shig ces sgra 'byin te// rnga yis bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing / skrag pa med de stobs kyang skyes par 'gyur// lha min dbang po skrag pas nyin pa rnams// 'jigs nas dmag
290a5(mdo 'grel): sa de yi mos las 'byer// de skad sgra skad 'byin pa'i rdo 'dra ba// 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen po// nyon mongs bdud btsam snying rje chen ldan rnams// zhi ba'i sgra bsgrags nyon mongs sel bar
290a6(mdo 'grel): byed// dbang po lha yi lho bu mo dgu bcu gnyis// dbang po'i sprul pas kun kyang dgo' bar 'gyur// gcig kyang bdag kya dang brgya byin rtse bar shes// gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no// lha mo
290b1(mdo 'grel): dang dga' bar gnas snang zhing // chos bzang mdun sa na yang de bzhin 'dug/ lha rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing // brgya byin skad cig gcig la rnam par 'phrul// brgya byin chags sdang gti mug ldan pa
290b2(mdo 'grel): yang // sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na// 'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed// bdud kyi dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba// de yi dbang du
290b3(mdo 'grel): sems cad na 'di kun 'dong // las dang nyon mongs kun du zhugs pa yis// so so'i skye bo thams cad bdud kyis bcings// chags sdang gti mug ldan pA rnams bdud de yang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang
290b4(mdo 'grel): du 'gyur byed na// dbang bcu dbang thob rnams la ci rlo ba ste// 'gro ba thams cad rang gi phyogs mi 'jog/ stong gsum gnas kyis bdag po tshangs pa yang // stong gsum tshangs gnas ji snyed yod pa na//
290b5(mdo 'grel): nga dag kunr-i nA 'dug par rab snang zhing // tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu yid 'ong sgrogs// tshangs de 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam+ba gyi// bsam gtan mngon shes rnam par 'phrul byed na// 'jig rten rab 'das
290b6(mdo 'grel): bla na med po yi// bsam gtan rnam thar gnas cis mi 'phrul// dbang phyug chen po'i shes pa'i rnam 'phrul ltas// rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char thigs rab bkye ba// skad cig gtsog la thams cad bgrang ba
291a1(mdo 'grel): byed/ thigs dga'i zer kyang ma shes de med na// bslab pa bskalpa pA bsam yas rab bslabs te// byang chub bla med ye shes thob pa rnams// ci phyir skad cig gcig
291a2(mdo 'grel): las sems kyis ni// 'gro ba ma lus rnams kyi sems mi shes// sems can las smin bsam gyi mi khyab pas// 'jig rten 'di kun rlung las yongs su byung // rgya mtsho ri dang lnga yi gzhal med khang
291a3(mdo 'grel): rin chen rnam phye sa bon bkram pa blang byung // rlung las gyur sprin gyis char 'bebs shing // slar yang rlung nyid kyis ni sbyin zhi byed// 'jig rten gyis ni lo tog rlung gos bskyed// 'gro ba kun gyi bde mang
291a4(mdo 'grel): rlung gi byis so/ rlung des pha rol phyin la ma bslabs shing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la ma bslabs par// 'jig rten rnam smin bsam mo khyab ston ni// mchog thob pa dag ce sti ston mi byed ni
291a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba'o// bslab pa kun las btus pa la su dkon gsum rjes su dran pa'i lde'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / bsod nams 'phel ba'i don du rgyu gzhan yang bya ste// gang shog/
291a6(mdo 'grel): dus rnams kun du sems can don bya ba 'di yin no// 'di ni dkon mchog sprin las// de bzhin gsheg pa'i mchod rten nam de shegs pa'i sku gzugs la me tog gam bdug po'am spos gsol
291b1(mdo 'grel): na sems can thams cad kyi ngang tshul ngan pa'i dri dra ba bsal ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri thob par yongs su bsngo'o// de phyag dar dang zhal zhal byed na sems can thams cad kyi
291b2(mdo 'grel): spyod lam mi sdug pa med par 'gyur pa dang // spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs par yongs su bsngo'o// de me tog gi gdugs gsol na sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i
291b3(mdo 'grel): gdung ba med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o// de gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro ba 'di ltar sems can thams cad mya ngan lngas 'das pa'i grong khyer du gzung ngo snyam du sems skyed do// de phyir 'byung na sems
291b4(mdo 'grel): can thams cad 'khor po'i btson ra nas gdon to snyam du sems bskyed do// de gnas gnas khang gi sgo 'byed na 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi bde 'gro thams cad kyi sgo dbye'o snyam du sems
291b5(mdo 'grel): bskyed do// de sgo gcod na 'di ltar ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgo rnams glo cang ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// de 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la 'god snyam du sems bskyed do//
291b6(mdo 'grel): de glo g.yas pas nyal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du sems bskyed do// bdenas ldang ni 'di ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs
292a1(mdo 'grel): pa kun nas ldang ba rnams las bslang ngo snyam du sems bskyed // de lus kyi ched la 'gro na 'di ltar sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i 'gros 'gro bar gyur cig snyam du sems can
292a2(mdo 'grel): skye// de de ltar 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi zug rngu dbyung ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// de bkru ba shul byed na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mong
292a3(mdo 'grel): po'i dri ma skyon rnams bkru'o snyam du sems bskyed ngo // de lag pa bsnyal ba na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba rnams bsalo snyam du sems bskyed // de rkang pa 'khru na sems
292a4(mdo 'grel): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do// de gdong 'khyun 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ngo snyam du sems bskyed
292a5(mdo 'grel): de so shing za na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do// de lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar yongs smra bsdu'o/
292a6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bya bar shog cig snyam du sems bskyed do// zhes ji skad du gsung ba lta bu'o// yang
292b1(mdo 'grel): nA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gcan gzan khro bo'i dgon par son/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi byed skrag par
292b2(mdo 'grel): mi bya dang bar mi bya'o// ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don du thams cad yongs su btang ba'i phyir te/ dus 'di snyam du gal te gcan gzan dag gi bdag zos na 'di ltar sbyin pa
292b3(mdo 'grel): de byin par gyur cing // bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bdag bla na med po yang
292b4(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nga na dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song po'i sems can yong yi med par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam du sems
292b5(mdo 'grel): bskyed do// shA ri'i bu rkun po'i dgon par song na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dngang bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
292b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen pos de dag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la mkhas pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus kyang yongs su btang ba yin no yo byad dang 'tshogs chas kyang
293a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su btang ba yin te/ nges 'di snyam du gal te sems can de dag gi bdag gi yo byad dang 'tshegs chas rnams phrogs na de dag la sbyin pa de byin par gyur cig/ gal te de dag gis
293a2(mdo 'grel): bdag gi srog gcad par gyur kyang de la bdag gi zhe sdang dang khong khro ba skyed par mi bya/ bdag gi de dag la lus dang nga gau dang yid kyis kyang nyes pa myi bya'o// de ltar na de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
293a3(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / bdag bla na med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu nye bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar bdag bla na
293a4(mdo 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/ sangs kyi zhing de na nyes pa 'di dag dang gzhan yang yo med rnam pa thams cad mi 'byung zhing med par 'gyur ba de lhur bya'o// /
293a5(mdo 'grel): de ltar bsgrub par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// shA rI'i bu chu'i dgon par phyin na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi byA dngang bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir
293a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mi 'jigs pa'i chos can yon te/ ngos 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi srid pa thams cad gcad par par slab par bya'o// byang chub sems
293b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skyugs par mi bya'o// gal te bdag skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ kye ma 'di ltar 'jig rten nu rgyu'i
293b2(mdo 'grel): dgon pa 'di lta bu snang bas sems can 'di dog ni bsod nams chung ba tsha dag ste/ ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas pa'i tshe// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
293b3(mdo 'grel): de na chu'i dgon pa yang ye rnams pa thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsgrub bo// ji ltar yan lag brgyad dang ljon pa'i chu rnyed par 'gyur ba de ltar bsod nams kyi las la sems can
293b4(mdo 'grel): rnams sbyar bya'o// ji ltar de'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus brtan pa brtsam par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// /
293b5(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang bkres pa'i dgon pa 'di lta bu yod yi rnam pa thams cad mi 'byung ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyu bar song na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi byi skrag par
293b6(mdo 'grel): mi bya dngang bar mi bya'o// des 'di ltar 'dis go che bgo ste/ ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe// sangs kyi zhing de na bkres pa'i dgon pa
294a1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta bu yod ye rnam pa thams cad mi 'byung ba dang // mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang sems can de dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur 'gyur zhing bde ba la dbang ba dang bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur
294a2(mdo 'grel): pa de ltar brtson 'grus brtan po brtsam par bya ste/ de ltar rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// de ltar na sems can de dag gang ci sems par 'gyur ba dang yid kyi gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de 'byung
294a3(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur// 'di lta ste dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yid la bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / yid la bsam pa thams tha cang 'byung ba bzhing du de ltar bya'o// ji ltar sems can de dag
294a4(mdo 'grel): chos dang ldan pa'i bsems pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad du thams cad las 'tshe ba'i yo byad dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtan po brtsam par
294a5(mdo 'grel): // ma du sems bskyed par bya'o/ zhes bya ba'o// de ltar dus rnams kun tu sems can gyi don bya ba 'di ni bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu ste/ zhib tu spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mad+mo las blta bar
294a6(mdo 'grel): 'o// gzhan yang / chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing mong / bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur te// lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las ji skad gsungs po lta bu ste// byams pa gang zhig thob pa dang
294b1(mdo 'grel): bkur sti mi 'dod par chos sbyin pa byin na/ chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med pa'i phan yon nyi shu ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ blo dang ldan pa yin/ blo grosna dang ldan pa yan//
294b2(mdo 'grel): mos pa dang ldan pa yin/ shes rabI dang ldan pa yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rjesu rdzu rtog par 'gyur ba yin// 'dod chags chung ba yin zhe sdang chung ba yin// ti mug chung ba yin/
294b3(mdo 'grel): bdud kyis de la glags mi rnyed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom 'das rnams kyi sna dgongs pa yin/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyis de bsrung ba yin/ lha rnams de'i de lus la mngangs 'jug pa yin/ mi 'dza'
294b4(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyis de la glags mi rnyed pa yin// de mdza' bo rnams dang mi phyed pa yin/ cho ga gzung bar 'os pa yin/ mi 'jig pa thob pa yin// yod bde ba mang ba yin/ mkhas pas bsngags pa yin//
294b5(mdo 'grel): de chos kyi sbyin pa de rjes rjes su dran par 'gyur ba yin te// byams pa phyin yon nyi shu po de dag go zhes bya ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang gsungs te/ gal te kun dga'
294b6(mdo 'grel): bo khyod kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag rnams la nyan thos kyi sa'i chos bstan la// chos bstan pa des kyang gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag
295a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas par gyur kyang / da dung nyan thos khyod kyis nga la nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyi byang chub sems
295a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gcig cig bstan nam bshad na/ de ltar na nyan thos kyis nga mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// tshe sde brgyan pa sngams
295a3(mdo 'grel): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jis rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur la/ dgra bcom pa de dag gis sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / chos
295a4(mdo 'grel): yis byung ba'i bsod nams smra ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de la kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba yin nam/ gso
295a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das mang lags so dade bar gshegs pa mang lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas kyang su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
295a6(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed do// kun dga' bo de bas kyang gang su zhig byang chub sems
295b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos thu na nyi ma gcig ston nu de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed do// kun dga' bo nyi mu gcig lta zhog la tha na snga dro 'am// kun
295b2(mdo 'grel): dga' bo snga dro lta zhog la tha na chu tshod cig nas skad cig gcig ces bya ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ kun dga' bo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i chos sbyin pa ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
295b3(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis mnan pa'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtse ba 'di lta bu sems pa la ni
295b4(mdo 'grel): gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa de ni gnas med do zhes bya'o// chos kyi sbyin pa
295b5(mdo 'grel): ji ltar sbyin par bya zhe na/ 'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las gsungs pa/ mkhas pa dus su sems par byed pa na// khang bur zhugs te de bzhin sgro bcad nas// chos 'di thams
295b6(mdo 'grel): cad la ni tshul bzhin blta// langs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis shod// mkhas pa bde la rtag tu gnas par 'gyur// bde la 'dug nas de bzhin chos kyang ston// gtsang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sa
296a1(mdo 'grel): phyogs su// yang ba'i bstan ni rab tu bshams bting ste// bzang po'i tshen gyis legs par kha bsgyur ba// chos gos gtsang ma de ni rab bgos nas/ rdul gzan nag po de bzhin
296a2(mdo 'grel): bshams byas la// shams thabs tshe tshad legs par bgos nas// bcos bu'i ras rnams sna tshogs legs bting ba// rkang rten bcas pa'i khri la rab 'dug cing // rkang pa legs par bkrus te steng
296a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzegs nas// gdong dang bzhin gyi mdangs ni rab tu snum zhing // chos kyi stan de la ni rab 'dug nis// sems can lhag pa rtse gcig gyur rnams la// gtam mang sna tshogs mang po smra ba dang // dge slong
296a4(mdo 'grel): dag dang dge slong ma rnams dang // dge bsnyen rnams deng dge bsnyen ma ngag dang // rgyal po dag dang rgyal bu rnams la yang // mkhas te rtag tu phrag dog med par ni// sna tshogs don ldan snyan pa'i gtam
296a5(mdo 'grel): yang ston/ l-i yo dag kyang rnam par rab spangs nas// skyo ba yi ni 'du shes bskyed mi bya// mkhas pas mi dga' thams cad rnam par spang // byams pa'i stobs ni 'khor li sgom par bya// nyin mtshan du yang
296a6(mdo 'grel): chos mchog rab tu sgom// mkhas pa de ni bye ba khrag khrig dpes// 'khor rnams mgu zhing de bzhin dga' bar byed// de la nam yang 'dod pa chung zad ming // zas dang skom dang bza' ba dang bca' ba dang //
296b1(mdo 'grel): gos dang mal cha chos gos rnams dang ni// na ba'i gsos sman dag kyang mi bsam ste// 'khor rnams la ni ci yang mi bsrung ngo // gzhan du mkhas pa rtag tu bdag nyid dang // sems can 'di dag sangs rgyas
296b2(mdo 'grel): grub par shogs// phan phyir 'jig rten chos gang bstan pa de// bdag gi bde ba'i yo byang kun snyam sems zhes bya'o// yang de nyid las/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston pa na// chos kyi dga'
296b3(mdo 'grel): ba snyoms pa byed de tha na 'ga' tsam la yang chos kyi dga' bas lhag par 'dogs par mi byid ngo zhes gsungs so// zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las kyang // chos kyi sbyin pa'i ched kyi phyir// gal te khyod la gsol
296b4(mdo 'grel): bA 'debs na// rab rgyas dag gis ma bslab zhes// thog mar tshig de brjod par bya// khyod ni shes shing mkhas yin na// bdag nyid chen po'i mdun du ni// bdag gi ji ltar bshad nus zhes// khyod
296b5(mdo 'grel): kyis de skad brjod par bya// 'phral du brjod par mi bya yi// snod la rtag pa byas nas/ bya// gal te snod ni shes gyur na// gsol ma btab kyang bshad par bya// 'khor ni mang po 'khod nang du/
296b6(mdo 'grel): gal te ngang tshul ngan mthong na// khyod kyi yo byad bskyongs mi bi shang// sbyin po'i bsngags par brjod par bya// gal te 'dod pa chung gyur te// tshul khrims dag par gnas yin na// khyod kyi byams
297a1(mdo 'grel): da'i sems bskyed la// yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam gyis shig/ gal te sdig 'dod chung gyur cing // tshul khrimasna ldan pa mang gyur la// gnyen po rnyed pa de yi tshe// tshul khrims
297a2(mdo 'grel): bsngags par brjod par byA zhes gsungs so// 'phags blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las kyang / 'di lta ste/ shA me sha ma ba te/ sha mi te shra t+yaM AM ku re/ mi ku re/ sA ra dzi ti/ ka ro ti/ yU ri/ oM ba ti/
297a3(mdo 'grel): u ko hA ya ti/ bi sha tha~M ni rma le/ mAM lA ba na ye u kha re// kha ro gra se/ gra sa ne/ he mu khI/ pa ra mu khI/ sha mi ta nI/ sarba gra ha ban+da d+hu nA nI/ ni grI hI tI/ sarba pa ra pra ba di na bi mug ta maM ra pA shwasmA
297a4(mdo 'grel): pa tA/ bud d+ha mu dAH/ sa mung g+ha ti tA sarba mA rA/ a tsa li ta pa da pa ri shud d+hA/ bi gats+tshan ti/ sarba ma ra karma Ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho sngags kyi tshig 'di ngag ni bdud tshar bcang ba'i tshig nyon mongs pa bsal
297a5(mdo 'grel): tshig ste/ de dag chos smra ba nges legs pa kha ton du byas la chos kyi khri la 'dug ste byang chub kyi rnam par mngon par sgrub pa'i byams pas 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la/ bdag la sman pa'i 'du she
297a6(mdo 'grel): bskyed de// chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang / chos nyan pa la nang pa'i 'du shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes bu dam pa'i 'du shes dang / chos kyi tshul lo yun ring du gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed la/
297b1(mdo 'grel): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag mngon du byas te/ chos kyi gtam byed na/ de'i 'khor yug dpag tshad brgya tshun chang du bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams 'tho 'tsham par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag 'ong ba de dag
297b2(mdo 'grel): gis kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so zhes gsungs so// yang de nyid las/ tshes smra bas gtsang sbra dang / kun du spyod pa gzob pa dang / legs par bkrus pa dang / legs par gos bgo bar bya'o zhes
297b3(mdo 'grel): so// de ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang / byang chub sems ni mdor sdu na bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu yin no// dkon mchog za ma tog gI mdo las ji skad du/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dpe na spos kyi shing
297b4(mdo 'grel): ljon pa sna tshogs ni khamaso bzhis bzung nas rnam par 'phel lo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du tshogs bsags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub kyi sems kyi bzung zhing / thams cad
297b5(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na rnam par 'phel lo zhes gsungs pa bzhin no// phyogs 'di ni las dang po pa rnams 'phral tu byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dran par bya ba'i phyir bstan te/ rgya cher
297b6(mdo 'grel): ni sangs rgyas kyi yul nyid yin no// 'dir bslab pa ji skad brjod pa 'di'i// 'grub pa yang ngag spong rnams te// bag yod po dang ma bral zhing // dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang // tshul bzhin du ni
298a1(mdo 'grel): sems pas so// de la sdig pa mi 'an chos sgyu nadang de na
298a2(mdo 'grel): so zhes bya ba 'das ni bsrung ba'o// sdig pa mi dge pa'i rlus rgyad pa'i phyir 'dun pa ces bya ba 'as
298a3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams gnas pa dpa'aphel ba'i bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'ji da// de dag kyang rgyun tu bag yod pa pa
298a4(mdo 'grel): las ji skang du/ tshul khrims thos dang gtong dang de bzhin bzung / dag pa'i chos su brjod pa ji snyed pa// kun gyi byed
298a5(mdo 'grel): no// bag yod pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin zhe nams mas pa dang 'ang lta bang ngongs pa smran ltar ldan pa
298a6(mdo 'grel): thar spyan gyi 'bu mar gyi gang ba snang mags pa 'i gro bas bya ba bzhin no// de bzhin de gsang ba'i mdo la
298b1(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ gang 'di dbang po sdom pa'o// de mig gis gzugs rnams rje mthong na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa nas/ yid kyi chos rnams rnam par shes na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing
298b2(mdo 'grel): mngon par rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/ chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs dang 'byung yang yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes pa ste/ 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bag yod
298b3(mdo 'grel): pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang / gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang / na mongs pa la dga' ba sel ba dang // chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la sogs pa 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o//
298b4(mdo 'grel): gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang ldan zhing bgu yod pa dang ldan pa des ni brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang dad par byed pa dang dad par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i
298b5(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o// gseng ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des ni/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gang gis byang chub kyi chos rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i
298b6(mdo 'grel): dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin du sbyar ba la brtson par bya'o//
299a1(mdo 'grel): gsang ba'i bdag po tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bag yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes so// gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes bya zhes bya ba nas//
299a2(mdo 'grel): kun rdzob tu mig la sogs pa yod do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de bzhin du de nyid las sems can don brtson byang chub sems dpa' ni// tshul bzhin nyid kyi dben sems gang yin dang // rtag tu bag yod
299a3(mdo 'grel): 'chi med rgyu yin te// yongs su 'dzin med bde ba kun gyi rgyu zhes gsungs so// yang smras pa/ bdag gzhan mnyam nyid goms byas pas/ byang chub sems ni brtan par 'gyur// bdag dang gzhan nyid
299a4(mdo 'grel): bltos pa ste// pha rol tshu rol ji bzhin nyid kyi brdzun// ngogs de rang gi pha rol mini/ gang la bltos te tshu rol 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gis ma grub na// gang la bltos te gzhan du 'gyur// gal
299a5(mdo 'grel): de la sdug bsngal bas// bdag la mi gnod phyir mi gasrung // mA 'ongs sdug bsngal khyod la ni// gnod mi byed pas ci ste gsung // de tshe 'ang bdag nyid yin snyam pa'i// rnam rtog de ni log bla ste/
299a6(mdo 'grel): gang byi ra 'chi ba gzhan nyid la// der skye ba yang gzhan nyid yin// gal te gzhan zhig de skyes// bsod nams kyis ni ci zhig dgos// ci phyir gzhon tshe lus rgas pa// bde bar bya phyir nor sol/
299b1(mdo 'grel): byed// mangs na gnas pa zhig pa las// byis par gyur pa gzhan yin// byis pa zhig nas gzhan na nyid// de zhig nas ni dal bab// de zhig nas ni rgas gyur te// lus ni ji ltar gcig par 'dod //
299b2(mdo 'grel): ltar skad cig so so bas/ lus gzhan sen mo sgra sogs bzhin// ci ste byis pa'i tshed bor nas// byis pa gzhon nu nyid gyur na// gang zhig gnas skabs bral gnas pa/ lus kyis rang bzhin brjod par gyis
299b3(mdo 'grel): lus ni sku gzugs 'dra zhe na// mar me thal ba la de med// gal te reg spangs phra dngos su// de la rnam par gnas zhe na// rang nyid bstan pa tsam 'gyur bas// de ni lus zhes brjod mi bya// de la bdag ni
299b4(mdo 'grel): pa med// snang ba'i lus ni 'jig dang ldan// gnas skabs rnams dang 'brul gyur pa// kun rdzob nyid du snang ba yin// lung gis kyang ni de yod na// rigs pa dang ni lung gis bzlog/ 'di ltar yon tan ma
299b5(mdo 'grel): gtogs par// gtso bo yod pa ma yin la// gtso bo gsum yang yod ma yin// de bzhin yon tan yod na yang // de yang so so rnam gsuM bdag/ 'gro ba lhag ma rnam dgur 'gyur// sems pa med pa gos la
299b6(mdo 'grel): sogs// de bde ba'i bdag nyid ji lta bu// snam sogs bde sogs las skyes min// snam sogs las ni bde sogs yin// snam bu la sogs rgyu med phyir// med na de bde ga la yod// de ltar lung dang rigs
300a1(mdo 'grel): pa yis// 'dus byas thams cad mi rtug pa// de yi rgyu 'bras 'brel pa ni// mngon sum yin pas mi gnod do// de ni rang gis rgyud las mthong // rtags pa la ni ji ltar bur// phra rab rdul
300a2(mdo 'grel): yang gcig min te// phyogs kyi dbye bas mi 'thad phyir// mar me'i 'bru mar zad 'gyur ba// zad 'gyur tshe na mngon pa med// de ltar dngos po zad par yang // skad cig re re mi mngon no// rgyud dang tshogs zhes
300a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba yang // phreng ba dmigs tshogs bzhin brdzun// de la goms bsu ngar 'dzin na// gzhan ci phyir skye mi 'gyur// de phyir ma skye mched tshogs bzhin du// 'gro ba gcig tu shes par bya// ma byung nyid nas
300a4(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal de// bang gzhan gyi bdag las phyir bzlog bya// de yang mi rigs 'gyur zhe na/ gzhan lo 'ang rang gi bdag nyid med// bdag gzhan mi rigs gang yin de// ci rigs par ni bzlog bya yin// snying rje
300a5(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal mang gyur pas// ci phyir nan gyi sa snyed ce na// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal brtag byas na// ji ltar gzhan gyis don byas pa snying rje sdug bsngal mang // de ltar rgyud ni goms gyusgyur ba// gzhon gyi sdug bsngal
300a6(mdo 'grel): ni dga' bas// pad+ma'i nags su dang pa ltar// mnar med par yang 'jug par 'gyur// sems can rnam par gros pa no// dga' ba'i rgya mtsho gang yin pa// ngo nyid kyis tshig min nam// rari med thar pas
300b1(mdo 'grel): zhig bya// de ltar gzhan gyis don byas pas// rlom sems dang ni ngo mtshar med// gcig tu gzhan don la dga' bas// rnam smin 'bras bu re ba med// phyogs bcu'i sems can phun tshogs de'i// bdag gi yin/
300b2(mdo 'grel): par godon mi za// gzhan de bdag gir 'du shes pas// bdag phrag dog skabs med// sdig pa bshad par bya ba dang // bsod nams rjes su yi rang dang // sangs rgyas bskul dang gsol gdab pa// gzhan dang
300b3(mdo 'grel): bdag gi phyir byed do// yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin te// bye brag med par rab tu 'jug/ de ltar sems can khams bzhin du// bsod nams mtha' yas rab tu 'byung // lam 'di dam pa mchog yin te//
300b4(mdo 'grel): bde ba mtha' yas dus ston bzang // byang chub sems dpa'i ded dpon ches// gang zhig dga' ba 'phel ba yin// lag na rdo rje sel mchog rnams// bdud kyi gcan pa skrag byed cing // sangs rgyas phyag
300b5(mdo 'grel): brnyan rnams kyis kyang // rtag tu yongs su bsrung ba yin// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal po'i sras// byang chub sems dpa' kyi shing rtar zhugs// lha la sogs pas stong byed cing // lam de nas ni 'gro/
300b6(mdo 'grel): bar byed// de ltar sems can rnams la bdag/ goms byas tshul gyi sgro gtags te// bdag gzhan sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir// bdag la sogs pa rnams kun btang // gang zhig sred pas yongs su
301a1(mdo 'grel): zin pa// de yi sdug bsngal zhing mi 'gyur// 'gyur bas rnam par chung zong nas// de ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal mas pas gdungs na// rang gi bde la dgar ci yod// kun nas tshig
301a2(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa yi// lus la'ang bde ba ci zhig yod// bdag la chags par byed pa ni/ sdug bsngal kun gyi rtsa ba mchog/ de ltas sems can thams cad la// bdag nor btang zhing de gzhom mo// rten
301a3(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel 'byung bsam pa yis// bdag la ma chags dran byas te/ 'bad pa kun gyis de'i pho nya// dam pa shes kho 'dod phan bya// gang gis 'jigs pas de mi gtong // de ma phyin na 'jigs pa
301a4(mdo 'grel): yin// 'di ltar bdag gi lus dang sems// skad cig re r-is 'gro ba nyid// gal te mi rtag dri 'bas pa'i// lus kyis rtag cing dri med kyi// byang chub thob par 'gyur na ni// de ni rin med rnyed min nam//
301a5(mdo 'grel): rtsi sman gzugs dang 'dra bar ni// 'jig rten chos la mi sems pas// de ltar bdag kyang btang thos// sems can kyi kun gyi don du spyod// sems can dkun gyi phyir blon por ni// rang gi shes ra
301a6(mdo 'grel): bkol bar bya// rig pas nor de bsrung byas te// sems can rnams la mkho bar spyad/ ya pa gzhan lus la// sdug bsngal mang sel sdug bsngal gang // de bya ba de'ang de bzhin te/
301b1(mdo 'grel): bde ba mang byed bskyed par bya// sems can longs spyod gegs byed phyir// bsgrims te nyon mongs sbyang byas te// 'jig rten 'tsho ba'i 'bab stegs nas// sbrul gyi ro bsal bzhin du bya// bdag gi lus dang gzhan/
301b2(mdo 'grel): lus la// sdug posngal mang sel sdug bsngal gang // de bya ba ngo 'ang bsod nams zhing 'di dag gyur no// phun sum lo tog 'bras bu che// bde ba'i mu gis gdungs pa yis// 'gro ba dag ni tshim par 'gyur//
301b3(mdo 'grel): 'thob dang bkur sti lus la sogs// skyi la bdag gi btang min nam// ci phyir dwa rdung 'khrug par byed// bdag gis rdzun du de skas sam// rang don gnod byed la sdang na// 'o na snying rje med pa'ang su zhig 'khrug/
301b4(mdo 'grel): zla rtsi bu ram shing ldi stsogs/ bdag pos mi shes bzhag nyes te// longs spyong du ni mi rung bas// spyod brgyad la sogs 'os yin bden// bdag po la ni phan 'dod nas// rim gro bya bar sems pa med/ de la
301b5(mdo 'grel): bskul ba 'ang mi byed de// longs spyod phyir yang 'gro mi byed// ma smos ma btab rgyal sras rnams// de dag rjes 'brangs nyer song ste/ sna tshogs mi bzang khams rnams dang // dbang po kun gyi sman chen
301b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// de dag shes byas dran byas te// khro ba dang ni gnod byed kyang // sdug bsngal rnams la zhim pa yid // rang bzhin mi 'dor bde bar byed// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / na mkha' zhes bya khams lnga po//
302a1(mdo 'grel): sems can ji srid gnas srid du// kun gyi don ni byed pa ste/ nyes spyong kun gyis de dag ni// sems can don las mi ldog go// de bzhin bdag gi khams drug po// 'di dag don
302a2(mdo 'grel): med mi bya'o// na mkha' mtha' ni ji tsam+ba par// 'jig rten mtha' ni srid gyur pa// de srid 'jig rten don byed pas// ye shes sngon btang gnas par bgyi// bya ba bsrungs nas bdag la ni// bdag gis
302a3(mdo 'grel): mi dri nan gyis su// slob dpon bdag gis brtag par bdag/ slob ma mchog bzhin bslab par bya// bdag gi bla ma bdag 'dra ba// bdag gi bag nyal skyon sus shes// bdag sdug bsngal dang bdag 'jig
302a4(mdo 'grel): pas/ su zhig de ltar sdug cing 'jigs// skyo bar mi 'gyur 'bros mi 'gyur// snying rje li song yul gyur cing // rtag tu nye bar gnas gyur pa// slob ma bdag 'dru ga la yod// nyon mongs kyi sgro gra
302a5(mdo 'grel): mug ljongs// g.yangs mang po'i lam du ni// gom pa re re reg 'cha' ba// bdag dang gzhan rtag mya ngan gzhi// 'gro ba rnams ni sdug bsngal mtshungs// de bas 'khrul pa tsam mi rigs// 'di la yon tan mtho ni ni//
302a6(mdo 'grel): mtshar chen po bya ba'i rigs// nyes pa rgya mtsho bdag gcig pus// blang bar nus pa ma yin pas// 'di na bdag la gzhan yang dgos// nyes las thar byed gzhan gang yin// pha rol bskul la mkhas pa po// gsol
302b1(mdo 'grel): bam btab phan byed kyi// tshig ni spyi bos blang bar bya// bdag ni kun gyi slob mar bya// nyon mongs dgra ni myung po dang // gcig pu bdag ni g.yul 'gyed tshe// de ni gcig dang 'thab pa na// gzhan ni bdag gi bde ba
302b2(mdo 'grel): 'joms// sdang dam mi sdang gyur kyang rung // de no la la rgyab nas bsam// gzhan nas 'jigs pa sgrogs byed pa// de ni bdag la srogs phangs sbyin// sdug bsngal kun gyi sman pa mchog/ bde ba'i dga'
302b3(mdo 'grel): skyon rab tshogs shing // rnam pa kun du nyer 'tsho ba// 'jam dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi sras// rnam kun rmad du byung rnams kyi// spyod pa nye bar bkod pa yi// dge ba bdag
302b4(mdo 'grel): gis gang bsgrubs des// bde gshegs go 'phang mtha' yas ni// nam mkha'i mtshams par dbang mdzad pa// de yi bde ba mtha' yas rnams// lus can dag gis thob par shog/ bsod nams spel ba
302b5(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// // bslab pa kun las btus pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba mdo sde du ma lA sa btus pa/ slob dpon zhi ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na
302b6(mdo 'grel): mi tra dang dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyi kha che'i paN+Di ta ti la ka kla shu dang / lo tsA ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis/ sri mnga'i dgon par
303a1(mdo 'grel): zhu thug legs par byas pa'o// rgyal sras spyod 'dir rab dang thos mang ba// gung thang dge slong shes rab 'byung gnas kyis// blo ldan thig le bum pa'i sems bzung nas// gzhung 'dir
303a2(mdo 'grel): nges bsgyur legs par zhu thug byas// de yi dad pa'i mthu dang gzhung 'di yi// che ba nyid kyis ding sang brtse ldan gyi// lam 'dir 'jug par 'dod pa'i skye bo rnams// dga' bas chos 'di phyogs bcur rgyas byed
303a3(mdo 'grel): shog// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yi ge brgya pa'i bsrung ba dang sdig pa bshags pa'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po brgyad stong bzlas
303a4(mdo 'grel): na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten lngas 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// de yang gang zhe na/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+hI kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nA/ sar+b+ba tA a pra ti ha tA bAp+ti/ d+har+m+ma twA ba li nAM/ a su mu sa
303a5(mdo 'grel): ma/ sa man+ta to nan+d+ra bAp+ti shA sa ni/ hA ra ha ru smA ra sma ra NA/ bi ga ta rA ga bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te/ sar+yA sa ra/ sa ma ba la/ hA sa ha sa/ tra ya tA yaM/ b+hA ga wan mi hA ba raM lik+Sha Ne/ dzA la dzA la na swe gau re sA hI// de ni de
303a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku yin to// 'di la gus pa bla na rmipa bya'o// 'dis las dang po pa dag kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// 'di nyid bdud
303b1(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa'i mchog yin no// thal mo brdab pa 'am/ thal ba 'am/ yungs kar ram/ chu 'am/ blta ba 'am/ yid kyis kyang mtshams gcod par byed do//
303b2(mdo 'grel): nad kyis btab na sman gyi chu la sngags kyis btab ste btung ngo // yang na mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam la nags kyi me tog sems mnyam par bzhag ste 'brul zhing zla phyed
303b3(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba byas na nad chen po dag lase thar par 'gyur ro// sang+yas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs dang / sems can thams cad la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar 'dod pa'i
303b4(mdo 'grel): sems kyis bzang po'i spyod pa sngon du byas byas pas bzlas brjod bya'o// cho ga 'di ni cho ga de'i mjug nas 'byung ba'o// dam tshig gsum gyi bzlas brjod byed pa ni khrus ma byas kyang nyes pa med do//
303b5(mdo 'grel): lhag mya dang gtsang sbra ma byas kyang nyes pa med do// phyag rgya 'dra ba dog mi bza'o// mi 'gom mo// khri la nyal bar mi bya'o// chung mi btung ngo // mos pas spyod pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi dag las mi g.yo
303b6(mdo 'grel): ba the tshom med na sngon ngang tshul ngan par gyur kyang 'grub bo// mkhas sam mi mkhas kyang rung ste nges par 'grub bo// de skad du de nyid las// gang zhig byang chub sems brtan zhing // blo gros chags pa
304a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang // the tshom dag mi byed pa// de la nges par 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs so// byang chub kyi sems bstan pa ni 'dir so so skye bo ni stobs dang ldan par nges par
304a2(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i phyir gsungs kyi// sar chud pa'i dbang du byas pa ni ma yin no// 'di la ma shes na sngags rnams yi ge lhag par brjod pa kyang nyes pa med do// nyung yang nyes par mi 'gyur ro// cho ga nyams
304a3(mdo 'grel): kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro// 'on kyang dad pa'i shugs dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi shugs dang / rang gi don dor ba'i sems brtsam par bya ste/ rnam par mi brtag par brjod na gdon mi za bar
304a4(mdo 'grel): tshwa 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba da tsa 'di 'dod po yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bslab pa kun las btus pa las 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i yi ge brgya pa'i bsrung ba dang
304a5(mdo 'grel): sdig pa bshags pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon zhi ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
304b1(mdo 'grel): ma marnam su bran la gas ldan gzhag rgyab da de largya man na mams de sa thal la' / tshul 'dis rgyal ba san yun ring 'phel bar zhog/
305a1(mdo 'grel): bslab pa kun las btus kyi mngon rtogs gser gling bas mdzad pa bzhug so//
305b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shik+Sha sa mu ts+tshu ya a b+hi sa ma ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ bslab pa kun las btus pa'i mngolnga rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag
305b2(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo// stobs bcu ldan pa gang gi zhabs rdul la// lha rnams cod pan gyis gtugs de bdud de// 'dzum pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs gtugs zhi ba'i lhas// bslab pa'i gnas rnams mdo sde kun las
305b3(mdo 'grel): btus// dang po gnyis ni phyi ma bdun gyis ba shung // gnyis kyi don ni rnam mgur shes par bya// lnga yi 'og dang gnyis kyi gong ma ni// dang po yin te gzhan na gnyis pa yin// gnyis ka'i don ni zla ba
305b4(mdo 'grel): tshes pa dang // nya dang sdig pa gser gyi 'khor lo dang // glang po bdug dang thig le dang po dang // 'dzem pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag na ral gri 'dzin// rin po che ni khyad par gnyis dang bcas// dang dang bla ma'i
305b5(mdo 'grel): tshegs dang go cha dang // byin rlabs phyir mi ldog dang spyod pa dang / lung bstan pa ni sku gsum yon bcas// bzhi las 'bras bur gyur par dang po ste// gsum ni yang dag spong bar rab tu gnas// gnyen
305b6(mdo 'grel): po gang la de yi ngo bo ste// rten dang nyes pa spong ba dang po yi ni// sun 'byin pa yi gnyis par brjod// gnyen po spyod pa gnyis pa'i dang po ste// spyod pa tha ma de yi gnyis pa yin// mi mthun pa ni rnam
306a1(mdo 'grel): pa brgyad yin te// las dang nyon mod lta ba dag las na// 'gyur dang gyur pa'i khyad par rnam pa drug/ rAng gi nA thA ma gnyis dang bcas// 'gyur ba gsum ni dang po'i chos su/
306a2(mdo 'grel): bzhag/ gyur pa gsum ni drang po'i gnyis pa ste// rtsa ba gnyis kyang de dang mthun pa yin// gyur pa gsum ni gnyis pa ste// rten gyi dang po'i chos kyang de yi yin// gyur pa dang po stobs kyi dang po ste//
306a3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa gnyis pa gnyi phung po'i gnyis pa yin// gyur pa gsum pa phung po'i gsum pa ste// mi mthun gnyen po'i khyad par de yis bstan// tshogs kyi lam la lnga ni dngos yin te// de las gzhan pa rjes
306a4(mdo 'grel): su mthun pa yin// de las gzhan pa ya// sbyor ba'i lam la bdun ni dngos yin te// de las gzhan pa lnga ni rjes mthun yin// mthong ba'i lam la bcu ni dngos yin te// de las gzhan pa gnyis
306a5(mdo 'grel): ni rjes mthun yin// tshogs kyi lam la bsrung ba gtso bo ste// chos gzhan gsum po mos pa mchog dang ldan// sbyor ba'i lam la spel ba gtso bo ste// gsum po dag la ji ltar 'tsham par zad //
306a6(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i lam la dag pa gtso bo ste// gsum po dag gis bdag dang gan gyi don// bsgom pa'i lam li pha rol phyin pa ste// bsdu ba'i dngos pos 'gro ba tshim par byed// bslab pa kun las
306b1(mdo 'grel): datus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / dpal mar me mdzad ye shes dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// gser gling rgyal po dpal ldan chos
306b2(mdo 'grel): skyong gis// bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje mnyes byas pas/ bslab pa kun las btus pa'i mngon par rtogs// ka ma la dang mar me mdzad la gsungs//
