339b3(mdo 'grel): 'jigs la sogs mtha' yas la/ dad par byed pa bzhi pa ste// de dag dad pa'i dbang por 'dod// dad pa'i dbang pa'i chos rnams gang // nges pas dad par byas nas ni// gang gis yang dag
339b4(mdo 'grel): 'phel byed pa// de ni brtson 'grus dbang po yin// brtson 'grus dbang pos chos rnams gang // gsal por 'phel bar byed nas ni// gang gis byas nyams par mi byed pa// de ni dran pa'i dbang por
339b5(mdo 'grel): brjod// dran pa'i dbang pos rnams chos rnams gang // nyam pa ru ni mu byas la// gang gi rtse gcig tu byed pa// dau ni ting 'dzin dbang por 'dong // ting 'dzin dbang pos chos rnams gang //
339b6(mdo 'grel): slar yang rtse gcig byas nas ni// bdag nyid so sor shes byed pa/ de lo shes rab dbang por brjod// de dag ni dbang po lnga'o// / dad brtson dbang po lnga po lnga
340a1(mdo 'grel): pa nyid// stobs kyi rang bzhin nyid gyur nas// gang tshe bdud rnams kyi rgyal byas// mi nus de ni stobs 'phel ba'i// stobs kyi nyan thos la sogs kyis// theg dman
340a2(mdo 'grel): 'dod par myi byung nang // snu nA theg pa n+dan bon+da k+sha// das byan+tas g+sa bAn+da pA 'aM g+hu/ dag hU~M sbubs na/ bas rnams sbyi'aM b+hai dkon mchog gsam// sgyu yang
340a3(mdo 'grel): rjes su dran por bya// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni// yul 'khor skyong gi zhus par gsungs// sku gsum ye shes lnga bdag nyid// sangs rgyas che ba nges bsam pas// sems la gzugs
340a4(mdo 'grel): brnyan bzhin shar na// dge ba mngon par rab tu 'phel// de dag ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bstun pa'o// yon tan mtha' yas sgrub byed pa'o// chos la rjes su dran par bya// rgyal ba'i yon
340a5(mdo 'grel): tan mtha yas gang // chos 'ba' zhig las rab tu skye// de bzhin 'jig rten pa dag dang // 'jig rten+da 'dus pa'i bde ba kun// cho sa lnga rdzogs par 'grub pas na// de phyir gus pas spyad par
340a6(mdo 'grel): bya/ ji ltar sems can thams cad la// chos rnams snyoms par rab tu 'jug/ de bzhin sems can thams cad la// de ni bdag gis mnyam par bsgrug/ ji ltar nyin
340b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan mo ru// cho sna ni mtshungs par rab 'jug pa// chos bzhin mtshungs pa'i sems kyis ni// da ni bdag kyang 'jug par bya// 'phags pa 'phags min mi mtshungs zhes// zhing du lta ba rnam
340b2(mdo 'grel): spangs te// tshes ni rab tu 'jug pa bzhin// bdag kyang mtshan nyid cig tu 'jug sems can rnams kyi chos mi bsrung // chos kyis sems can bsrung bar byed// 'gro ba'i skyabs ni chos
340b3(mdo 'grel): yin gyis// chos kyi sgrubs ni 'gro ba min// chos ni srid pas mi 'jigs shing // mya dran 'das la rjes myi 'gal// de bzhin bdag kyang 'jig pa dag sbyong zhing de dag rjes su gzhol/
340b4(mdo 'grel): de dag ni chos rjes su dran pa'o// // dge 'dun chos kyi smra ba po// don du chos gnyer chos la sems// chos kyi zhing ste chos kyi mchog/ des na dge 'dun rjes
340b5(mdo 'grel): d+han+yA b+h+ya// de dge ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o// / de ltar bdag gisA lus sogs gsum// byang cha sems gzung ba stoni 'gro can// kun mkhyen nyid du yongs
340b6(mdo 'grel): bsngos pas// khyad par du ni rnam par 'phel// bdag nyid dran par bya phyir dang // dang po'i las can sems can la// bdag gis phyogs ci ma 'di bstan byas// bye brag 'phags pa
341a1(mdo 'grel): spyod yul yin// rgyal ba'i bslab bcu de drug bsdus byas lngas// dri med ston ka'i zla zer lhur 'bar ba'i// 'dir ni dge ba cung zad ci bsags pa//
341a2(mdo 'grel): de seMs 'gro ba'i bsgrub pa'i rgyan gyur cig/ bslab pa kun bsdus sngon shI las// phyogs cha tsam zhig blangs pa yi// bsgrub pa'i me tog skye ma 'di// mkhas pa rnams kyi rna bar bzung /
341a3(mdo 'grel): bslab pa'i me tog sne mA zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // bi kra ma lwa shI la'i paN+Di ta chen chen po bai ro tsA na rag+ni ta'i zhal snga nus sbyar ba'o// dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga'
341a4(mdo 'grel): bdag bodad+ma rje lbu btson po khri bokro shis na mkha' dbang phyug btsan gyi bka' lung gris rgya gar gyi mkhan po su mai ti kIrta dang / bod kyi lo tsI zha ma saM dge slong seng rgyal dang / glog skya gzhon
341a5(mdo 'grel): nu 'bar gyis bsgyur ba las// slad nas bod kyi lo tsA pa ban+di mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis zhus te gtan li phab pa'o// // shu b+hau/
341b1(mdo 'grel): ma yed+ha mahe tu pra bra lA he tu rne ShA n+ta zag to h+ya ba dang te Shabru yo na ro d+ha me'i 'di ma hA shwa ma Sha swA hA/
341b2(mdo 'grel): tshul 'dis rgyal bstan yun ring gnas par shog/
342a1(mdo 'grel): phar phyin bsdus pa dpa' bos mdzad pa bzhugs
342b1(mdo 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ bA ra mi tA s+yA ma sA nA ma/ bod skad du/ pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lnga phyag
342b2(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song bas// ston pa gzhan la phyogs pa yi// ser sna'i ngogs po yongs su sbyangs// bla na med bu'i sangs
342b3(mdo 'grel): rgyus sku// dobo ldan skyes chen mtshan 'chang la// ci nas shigs par mi nus pa// thob rtsol sangs rgyas skyabs song yin// 'jig rten skyabs med bsgrub pa'i phyir// spyod cing rang gi don btang
342b4(mdo 'grel): ste// sangs rgyas bsgrub phyir blo brtan nA// sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin// rga shi nang dang 'chi ba la s+ya// sems can mu gon med bskyab pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub smon na// /
342b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas skyabs su so nga po yin// mthong blos dran dong reg pa dang // dri cher ro myong cis kyang rung // 'gro ba kun la bde skyon dang // sngangs rgyas skyabs su snang ba yin// sems can
342b6(mdo 'grel): rnams la snyi nga rtse zhing // bde gshegs yon tan thob mos na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// mdor bsdus skyabs su song ba yin// byang chub mchog tu smon byed de// rang gi
343a1(mdo 'grel): don la mi lta zhing // gzhan don brtson yang nga med na// sangs rgyas skyabs su sangs rgyas song ba yin// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod chen la// gang zhig skyo med zhum med
343a2(mdo 'grel): cing // mos pa chen po skyeng byed pa// de ni sangs rgyas skyabs song yin// skyabs ni mchog no stobs bcu dang // stobs bcu'i chos zhes de tshol zhing // yon tan tshogs la dang skyid na// sangs
343a3(mdo 'grel): rgyus skyabs su song ba yin// 'jig rten 'di dag skyabs med pa// skyabs su bya bo zhes dam brtan na// de ni 'gro ba'i skyabs yin te// sngangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin// nyon mongs bcas pa'i
343a4(mdo 'grel): bo'i sems ldan pa'i// sems can gang tshe ma skyong gyur pa// de tshe mos po che bskyed cing // gcig las rnam mdo sbrul byas te// 'jig rten dpag yas thams cad la// phan pa kun stobs
343a5(mdo 'grel): lus dang sems// sems bdag gis gus par bya'o zhes// su sems sangs rgyas skyabs song yin// skyabs su 'gro ba dang po'o// // dam chos 'khor los sgyur ba yi// rgyal por
343a6(mdo 'grel): gyur te 'chi meng pa'i// lam gyis 'gro ba skyabs smon na// chos la skyabs su song ba yin// bdag kyang 'jig rten mtha' med kyang // snying rjes yongs su mi gtong zhing // dam chos bstan par
343b1(mdo 'grel): gang myos pa// de ni chos la skyabs song yin// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// bdag ni dam chos bstan bya zhes// sems can don la sems gnyen na// chos la skyabs su song ba yin//
343b2(mdo 'grel): mang thos nan tan rgyan ldan dang // gzhan la bstan pa'i don sgrib na// chos la skyabs su song ba yin// mtshan ma shin tu gsal ba yin// 'jig rten lus thams cad la// chos 'di skyabs kyi mchog
343b3(mdo 'grel): yin zhes// rtog cing dam chos tshol byed na// chos lnga skyabs su sbyong ba yin// chos kyi slob dpon snyen byed cing // nyan 'dod tshul bzhin yid byed la// ston cing nan tan lhur byed no// chos la
343b4(mdo 'grel): skyabs su song ba yin// dam chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// spyod pas yang dag spyod byed cing // lus dang srog la mi lta ni// chos la skyabos su song ba yin// byang chub mchog gis phyogs
343b5(mdo 'grel): kyi chos// bdag don ma yin gzhan don du// snying rje chen pos spyod byed na// tshwas l-i skyobs su song ba yin// gu zhig bde la chags med la// sdug bsngal rnam pas mi 'dzegs shing // 'jig
343b6(mdo 'grel): rton phan spyod chos shes na// chos la skyabs su song ba yin// dam chos tshul 'di ma thos pas// 'jig rten 'di dag dman 'gyur zhes// ston cing nan tan don byed na// chos la skyabs su song
344a1(mdo 'grel): pa yin// 'gro bu ma lus thams cad kyang // bdag gi chos la dgod bya zhes// sems bskyed nan tan spyod byed na// chos la skyabs su song ba yin// snrubs su
344a2(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba gnyis pa'o// // mos shin tu rnam dag pas// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun drung 'gro ba// gang gi bsam pa mri bzlogs pa// de ni/ dge 'dun skyabs song yin// nges
344a3(mdo 'grel): par lhung bar gyur ba yi// nyan thos theg pa la gnas pa rnams// byang chub sems ni skyed byed na// dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin// dge 'dun yon tan dran byas shing // dge 'dun bzhin du bkur
344a4(mdo 'grel): gnas su// 'jig rten thams cad bkur myos na// de nr-i dge 'dun skyabs song ba yin// byang chub go chu rtan byed cing // dge 'dun rnams lnga tshor mos pas// dge 'dun bsnyen bkur gang dad pa//
344a5(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang // rnam grol dri shrIs ston la sogs// dge 'dun yon tan rin chen gyis// 'jig rten rgyan par mos pa dang // dge 'dun dag
344a6(mdo 'grel): la dang brten pas// 'gro ba mang po kun gyis kyang // dad pas bzlog par mi nus na// de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin// skyes bu dam pa rin po ches// bcas pa'i mu stegs gtsang ma ste// bdud
344b1(mdo 'grel): la shin du dpa' ba yi// skyes mchog de ni dge 'dun yin// yang dag ji bzhin smra byed cing // de la chung phul yangs 'gyur zhes// de 'dra'i rnam dag sems 'chung na// dge 'dun skyabs su song
344b2(mdo 'grel): bu yin// byang chub mchog sems mi ldog dang // dbang dang tshad med yon tan gyis// brgyan pa'i yon tan gleng tshol ba// de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin// dkon mchog gsum yi skyabs srid pa//
344b3(mdo 'grel): sems can 'jigs med don 'gyur bA se// dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs ldan ni// de phyir mi 'jigs sbyin bdag yin// skyabs seng bsod nams gzugs yod na// khams gsum 'di yang
344b4(mdo 'grel): snod du chud // rgya mtsho chen po'i chu yi gter// phul gyis bcul bas gzhal mi nus// skyabs su 'gro ba gsum pa'o// // skyabs 'gro gsum byas phyin chad sbyin
344b5(mdo 'grel): pi la/ ci nas lus kyi yan lag bslangs gyur kyang // tshul ngan gtong la zhum par mi 'gyur bar// 'jig rten phan par brtson pas sbyor ba bya// ser sna'i skyon nI gi 'phel 'gyur ram+b+ha// yongs
344b6(mdo 'grel): su gtong sems 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba'i// yongs su 'dzin bgegs su 'gyur ba'i slu ba dag/ byang chub sems dpas ma lus yongs su spangs// gang zhig gtong sems gnyen por 'gyur ba dag
345a1(mdo 'grel): yang ngag byang chub lam la sgrim byed na// de 'dra'i nor ram rin chen rgyal srid kyang // byang chub sems drapas blang bar 'os pa min// thub pa rnams kyi spyod mchog
345a2(mdo 'grel): dran byas shing // de gzhol rang gi dam bcas bsdam byas te// yongs 'dzin chags pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir// sems la rtogs pa'i dam pa 'di dag rtogs// 'gro ba kun la bdag gi lus
345a3(mdo 'grel): btang ste// de btang chos kyang 'di de lhag bdag gi spang bya na// phyi rol dngos lnga bdag gis chags bya ba// glang po'i khrus bzhin bdag la rig pa mA ni// sha la don gnyer sha 'di bkur bar
345a4(mdo 'grel): gyis// rkang 'dod sems can rkang yang brus te khyer// bdag gau lus 'di 'di ltar bkur ba yang // 'jig rten don ngan phyi rol dngos ci smos// ji ltar sman gyi sdong po skyes gyur la// lo ma
345a5(mdo 'grel): me tog skye bo 'thog byed kyang // 'di dag bAdag la blangs shing khyer byed ces// rnam par rtog par rtog pa de la rgyu bo med// de bzhin 'jig rten de ni la brtson+da bya yis// drin med
345a6(mdo 'grel): rtag tu mi gtsang sdug bsngal ba'i// lus 'di gzhan la phan zhing mkho gyur na// bdag gir bya snyam rnam rtog chung mi skyed// nang gi sa dang chu la sogs pa dag/ phyi rol 'byung ba chen po'i
345b1(mdo 'grel): tshegs mtshungs na// 'di ni bdag gI 'di ni gzhan gyis zhes// ma rigs 'dam gyi rtog skyed tshul ma yin// bdag gi lus kyang ci bder blang bar gyis// 'di la gzhan gyi yin snyam blo ma skyed// /
345b2(mdo 'grel): 'di dag thams cad khyed kyi dngos yin te// 'di la bdag gi nga rgyal bdag la med// de'i dri'i rmad byung bsam pa rnams dang yang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rjes 'brang ba// gang la
345b3(mdo 'grel): yod pa byang chub sem dpa' zhes// sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab skyes mchog gsung // de ltar sbyin la nan tan brtson pa de// lus nam yang chags par mi byed pas// dwe yi dgra lus
345b4(mdo 'grel): yid kyi las rnams kyang / lhun gyis grub par rnam par dag par 'dod// rnam dag las can gzhan la phon byed na// tshigs su 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngalnga med par byed// de ltar rig pa'i tshul
345b5(mdo 'grel): la mngon zhugs pa// tshul dung tshul min mkhas pa dngos su 'thob// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang pa thob gyur nas// srid pa'i mun nad 'thims pa'i skye bo la// dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa
345b6(mdo 'grel): rgya chen gyis// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od pas gsal bar byed// 'jig rten pa'i don sgrub snyoms pa de// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'grub gzhir gyur pas// nyi shar zer bkye 'od chen mi zad
346a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin// de yi bsod nams yun du zad mi shes// de 'dra rmad byung sbyin pa'i yon tan tshogs// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i rgyanu gyur pas// de phyir sbyin pa snying //
346a2(mdo 'grel): rje sngon 'gro la// yongs su sbyong ba'i nan rnam pa mang // tshe dang spobs pa sangs rgyas stobs la sogs// 'gro ba kun la bdag gi br-i sgrubI bya zhing // zang zing sbyin pas bsdus pa'i sems
346a3(mdo 'grel): can dag/ bdag gi dam chos snod du 'gyur ro zhes// de ltar kha zas skom rnams btong bar byed// rang gi phun sum tshogs pa sgrub phyir mi no// nyon mongs skom pa gzhi la phyir btung ba
346a4(mdo 'grel): dag/ 'jig rten phan byed 'jig rten rnams la gtong // sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che ba'i rnam pa dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i ba de bo thams cad kyang // 'jig rten 'di dag ji ltar thob
346a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhes// thig tshon smos pa theg pa yongs su sa gtong // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku mdog gosar 'dra dang // khrel ltas rgyu la las byung ba'i gos bsgrub par// gos kyi rnam
346a6(mdo 'grel): par grangs med mang po dag/ lus la bde bar rim gro sbyin par byed// snying po byang chub gnas phyir gtan stong ste// mal gsum don du mal gyi sbyin pa byed// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
346b1(mdo 'grel): spyan mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir// mAchod rten gtsug lag khang du mar me 'bul// lha yi rna ba 'thob phyir rol mo dang // sangs rgyas tshul khrims bsgrub phyir spros kyang 'bul// skyabs su
346b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba yongs su bskyob pa'i phyir// khyim dang btung gnas rab gnas rnams gtong // bro bo ro mchog yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir// shin tu zhi mo sbyar ro rnams gtong bar byed/
346b3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten 'di dag rga shi med stobs par// sman gyi mchog rnam grangs med sbyin par byed// nyon mongs tshogs kyi 'khor ba'i 'jig rten rnams// ra ba byung bdag nyid mnyam par
346b4(mdo 'grel): bsgrub pa'i phyir// de ni rtag tu ban+da dag gting byed cing // sems can bla medA tshos kyi rjer yang bsgrub// mtshon rab bzang po se phun suma? tshogs bsgrub par// mu tig bye ru
346b5(mdo 'grel): gas+ye ra l+ya sogs pa gtong // dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir// rin chen sgron+da ma rgyan gyi sbyin pa byed// bsam gtan sgrub phyir brtul zhug sa nags chel bdang // rlom pod byinan
346b6(mdo 'grel): mdzad yongs su gtong // thub dbang rgyal po thob phyir skyon med par// rgyal srid bkas brgyan sbyin pa gtong bar byed// byang chub mchog la mos phyir skyon med par// bu dang bu mo sdug
347a1(mdo 'grel): @pa'i sbyin pa byed gcig tu chos la dga' zhing mos pa'i phyir// dgra ba'i rgyur gyur rtsed mo sna tshogs btong // 'khor los brgyan pa'i rkang pa mchog thob ste//
347a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub snying por gnas par mos po'i phyir// 'jig rten don chen bsgrub par brtson pa de// rtog pa med par rkang pa yongs su gtong // sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skye shi'i chus g.yengs pa'i
347a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten chos kyi las lag pas bskyob bo zhes// lag pa pad+ma rgyas 'dra gtong bar byed// dbang po lnga dag rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir// sna dang rna ba skyon med yongs su gtong // 'jig rten
347a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad sgrib pa kun spangs te// rnamo ngag mig ldan bsgrub phyir mig kyang gtong // so chu me dang rlung ltar rtog med cing // 'jig rten nyer 'tshor bdag gi lus sgrub ces// sha bcad khrag
347a5(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa gtso bo de// snying rje chen pos yongs su gtong bar byed// rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa brtan pa de// rdo rje lta bu'i char pa bab gyur kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog mi bshigs
347a6(mdo 'grel): pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi thob phyir rkang pa yang gting // 'jig rten blar gyur ye shes mnyam gzhag phyir// skye bo slong du 'ongs pa thams cad la// lus kyi dam pa dgos kyang mchod byed na//
347b1(mdo 'grel): lus kyi yan lag gzhan lta ci zhig smros// de la sogs pa rgyun skyon med par// byang chub sems dpa' spyod las yongs btang ba'i// sbyin pa'i char gyis 'gro ba tshim byas shing // thams cad
347b2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor mngon par 'gro// de ni mi rigs bcol zhing sbyin ma pa dang // gzhan la gnod po bcil zhing sbyin mi bya// de la gzhan la btang bas dma' ba med// de ni sbyin pas sgoms
347b3(mdo 'grel): pas bdag mo bstod// gzhan la gnod pa nan yang byed pa med// log pa'i sbyor ba yongs su mi gtong ste// lhag pa'i bsam pas me zin sbyin mi byed// khro ba'i skyon gyi dma'o bar mi gtong
347b4(mdo 'grel): ste// sbyin nus de la rjes su 'gyod mi byed// gtam byas bkur zhes mang du sbyin mi byed khrel gyis dgas sam 'jigs pa'i rgyu phyir ram// sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur phyir gtong bA min// bzang
347b5(mdo 'grel): po yod bzhin ngan pa gtong pa 'am// sbyin pa'i gnas min zhes te brnyas pa 'om/ rnam smin re bas dogs par byas pa 'am/ rim gro med cing smad par de mI gtAM // tshul khrims ldan la
347b6(mdo 'grel): phul bas mi mthong zhing // khengs shing brnyas zhes nyung bar gtong ba med// gang gi log pa'i tan tan rgyur gyur dang // slong ba rnams la gnod par sbyin mi byed// de ni dus min sbyin
348a1(mdo 'grel): par mi byed // dusa? dang mI mthun sbyin pa 'ang dri mi byed// wAr smon+d+ra ma yin+da rgyal por smyon phyir min// theg pa du man+ta skyon tshul gyi gtong mi byed// da ni bltas
348a2(mdo 'grel): gtong bar mi byed de// grags pa'i sgra dang gzhang gang don phyir min// gdag gis nus su zad ces mi rlom zhing // gzhin gyi srog la gnod phyir sbyin mi byed// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par
348a3(mdo 'grel): ma bsngos pa 'am// skyes bu dam+b+ha pas smad par gtong mi byed// de phyir pha rol phyin pa'i ming 'thob cing // shin tu rnam dag sbyin par yang dag 'gro/ de yi sbyin las byung ba'i bsod
348a4(mdo 'grel): nams tshegs// 'jig rten kun gyi bsod nims yongs bsdus kyang // de dag kun gyi zil gnon mi 'gyur pas// de phyir 'jig rten kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur// mngon shes lnga la shin
348a5(mdo 'grel): tu des 'gyur zhing // 'jig rten kun la sbyin pa'i char 'bab pas// phyogs rnams kun du de yi tshad mi zin// rtag par rgyun tu 'byung bas zad mi shes// bye bas mi zad 'gro la phan
348a6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur// ye shes mi zang rgya chen rgyu yod yin// kham gsum zad par 'gyur ba'i dngos po dang // mkha' dang sprin ltar rtag tu 'dre ba med// de ni stong nyid rnam par mi nyam gas
348b1(mdo 'grel): cing // mtshan ma'i skyon rnams yongs smra spangs pa dang // nyon mongs bsal zhing dman pa med pas na// thub dbang chen po rnams kyis mi zad gsungs// skyes bu dam pas ched du brjod
348b2(mdo 'grel): byas shing // bde rgya chen rgyu yi sbyin pa ni// byed par 'dod pas mi rtag rnal 'byor dang // 'jig rten rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed// ljongs spyod rnam po mi rtag mthong gyur cig/
348b3(mdo 'grel): snying rje chen po rang gi dang gyur na// sbyin pa bdog gis khyim bzhag gzhan gyi bar// shin tu rig pa'i tshul gyis rtog par 'gyur// gang byin de las 'jig pa skye mi 'gyur// khyim
348b4(mdo 'grel): nAM gang bzhag de las 'jigs pa 'byung // mi mchog thun mong rtag tu bsrung dgos te// byin no nyes pa de dag gnod mi 'gyur// byin pas 'jig rten pha rol bde ba sgrub/ me byin tshe 'od
348b5(mdo 'grel): nyid la 'ang sdug bsngal skyeng // mi yi nor rnams sbyar mda'i rang bzhin ltar// yongs su mA btang ba de dag med par 'gyur// ma byin nor rnams mi rtag med 'gyur te// byin pas de dag
348b6(mdo 'grel): yod pa'i gtir du 'gro/ sems can phan pa'i gzhol bas gang byin pa'i// nor rnams snying po med pa'ang yod par 'gyur// gang zhig yongs su btang ba mkhas pas bsdigs// skye bo
349a1(mdo 'grel): byis pa de dag sogs lnga dga'// yongs su gzung bsdu mi 'bral gang yang med// byin pas rtag tu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung // btang bas nyon myongs yongs su
349a2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin mi 'gyur// 'jungs pa 'phags pa'i lam min nyon mongs bskyed// gang zhig byin pa de ni lam gyi mchog/ de las gzhan gyur 'phags pas la ma ngan gsungs// slong ba sngon du
349a3(mdo 'grel): 'od na rgyal sras nges// rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs ni spel ba'i phyir// des gzhan 'du shes bdag la bzhag byas shing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes de la skyed// slong bya 'ongs
349a4(mdo 'grel): ba thos ni che ba rnams// nyon mongs mi dge' rnam par skab 'gyur bas// dga' ba'i ston mo chen po 'byung ba blos// slong ba sngon du 'ongs la dwe dang dge'u// ci ste slong ba mngon du 'ongs
349a5(mdo 'grel): gyur kyang // shin+d+ra tu mthu chung sbyin par ma nus na// ci na pa sbyong ba smra bab ma gyur pa// 'jam pa'i tshig gis de yis yid kyang bano// phyin chad srong ba drung dri 'ongs gyur na// cinaH
349a6(mdo 'grel): kho chad dma' bar mi 'gyur ba// 'jungs pa'i skyon rnams rnam par bsal ba dang // srid pa yongs su spang phyir nan tan bya// gang zhig zang zing nor la chags byed pa// de la byang //
349b1(mdo 'grel): chub mchog sems skye ba med// sems mchog de ni skyon dang mi 'grogs te// rgya mtsho chen po ro dang mi 'grogs bzhin// de bras rtag tu skyon rnams kun spangs te// byang chub tshol bas
349b2(mdo 'grel): rtag tu thams cad sbyin// 'jig rten thams cad gcig pu ngas skyabs pa'i// sems dang spyod dang zhum pa'i ngang mi mthun// sbyin pa de 'dri'o rtswa byang chub sems// de 'dra'i sbyin pa
349b3(mdo 'grel): gtong 'dod de mi bting // 'jig rten nang na gtong 'dod sems ldan pa// gtong ba'i nang na mchog ces rgyal bas gsungs// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lde'u'o// /
349b4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyu sa tshul khrims rgyun ldan par// 'gro ba thams cad bsgrub don gang brtson pa// rang gi tshul khrims thog mau rA yongs smra smyung // tshul khrim+b+has dag pa'i mthu yi
349b5(mdo 'grel): stobs kyang bskyed// ci nas rmi lam rmi yang 'tshe med par// 'jig rten kun lA byams pa bskyed par bya// gzhan la phan par gcig tu brtsin nges// gzhan gyi longs spyod sprul
349b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin rig mi bya// kha ton spyod pa'i blo las phyir log pas// thog mar gzhan gyi bud med bsgo ba'i blo// yongasu btang bya 'jig rten phan byed pas// lus kyi spyod pa skyes bu mochog
350a1(mdo 'grel): ltar bsgrub// snyan cing yid 'ong dus ldan pa'i tshig/ dbyen du mi 'gyur bden dang mthun pa dag/ dam chos yang dag khong du chud 'gyur ba// gnyen pos btsal cing rtug
350a2(mdo 'grel): tu brjod par bya// gzhan gyi bde ba phun sum thob gyur na// bdag gis zhi shAs gang zhig bsgrub bya // de dag kho bdag nyid kyi rnyed gyur ci sa// dga' sems bskyed bya chags sems
350a3(mdo 'grel): yongs su sbyangango // nyon mongs dbang gyur bdag pan mi reg pa// 'di ni bdag nyid mthu chung na na po'i mtha'// gzhan gyi nyes pa kun kyang de bzhin zhes// gno sems mi 'bar
350a4(mdo 'grel): gzhi la phyir ta nan tan bya// log lha'i 'du shes mun nag thibs po dag/ ye shes snang bas yid la bsal byas te// lha mi phul gyi yon tan bsgom byas shing // dad pa mi 'phrogs
350a5(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba brton par gzugs// mtho ris thar bde lam gyur pa ste// las lam bcu po 'di las nyams mi bya// 'di la gnas pa 'gro la phan bsams pa'i// bsam pa'i khyad par
350a6(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu yod par 'gyur// ngag lus yid rnams yang dag bsdam bya ba// mdor bsdus tshul khrims yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs// tshul khrims ma lus 'du ba'i gzhi yin pas/
350b1(mdo 'grel): de phyir 'di dag rnam par sbyang bar gyis// srog gcod spangs pa nges pa'i ngang 'chang bas// 'gro ba thams cad ston cing phebs par 'gyur/ de yi bag chags sems la skyon gyur pa// nan tan
350b2(mdo 'grel): ma byas rang gi yongs su 'chang // byams pa'i khyad par rjes mthun sems ldan zhing // kho na bcug rnam pa yongs su zhi 'gyur na// mya ngan rnam pa'i nyes pa kun spangs shing // bde bar du
350b3(mdo 'grel): nyu l-I bde bar sad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po dag kyang phran par byed// lam ngan rgyud kyis de la 'jigs pa med// nang med yon tan rgyan dang ldan pa yi// bde lam brten pa'i
350b4(mdo 'grel): tshe ring thob par 'gyur// de nyid rgyu yis byang chub brnyes pa yi// bde gshegs rnam sa kyi sku che dpag yas shing // 'jig rten bde ba bskyed cing don mdzad pa// dgongs pa'i
350b5(mdo 'grel): rjes su snyeg pa yo ngas su sa 'grub// gzhan gyi longs spyod ma byin ma blangs pas// 'jig rten gzhan du longs spyod rgya chen dag/ bud med dbugs kyis ri rab mi 'grul lhur
350b6(mdo 'grel): bgo skal ba dang 'phrogs pas mi 'phrogs 'grub// spyod pa dag pas kun gyi yid 'ong zhing // ston pa'i snod du tshe 'di nyid la 'grub// de phyir pha rol tu yang ngogs med cing //
351a1(mdo 'grel): lam+ba gyi gegs su gyur pa'i rnam pa med// sgyid longs yangs la snying po med rtogs pas// ched du ma bsgrubs sbyin pa'i dang du 'gyur// de phyir nye ba'i
351a2(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs rnam dag pas// bla na med pa'i byang chub dang gis 'thob// 'dod pa rnams la log par spyod spangs pas// dbang po thul phyir rab tu zhi la mos// 'jig rten bstod pas phyogs
351a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kun gyi mthar// grags pa khyab 'gro bsal ba kun 'thob 'gyur// bud med kun la ma ltar bltas pas na// nyon mongs 'dod chags gang la 'ang mi 'byung ste// de phyir de yi
351a4(mdo 'grel): bsod nams bsags pas nas// thob dbang skyes chen dbang po mtshan ldan 'grub// tshig tu gang smras brdzun las phyir bzlog pas// rab tu dga' ldan g.yo rgyu rnam ngag sems// tshig rnams//
351a5(mdo 'grel): kun gyis blang bar 'grub gyur pas// sems can mang po chos gzhol kun gyis 'grub// bden dang ldan li lha rnams byams gyur pa// lha yi rang bzhin yon tan phyog sna byed pa// de yi spyod pa/
351a6(mdo 'grel): kun la mngon sum pas// 'di 'dra de la ngo mtshar che ba med// 'jig rten gzhan byams tshad mar byed pa ni// 'jig rten phal cher yon tan mi 'chang la// rong gi tshod kyis gzhan lo tshang
351b1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin kyang // de 'drar gyur pa de ni ngo mtshar che// me tog uta pa la yi nags bor zhing // bde ldan kha ni pad mo 'phags tshul gyur du// dri zhim sim byed yid du 'ong ba dang // de yi kha la gnas
351b2(mdo 'grel): gnas 'cha' rten par 'gyur// ye shes 'bar ba ngan 'gro'i skar bu// rigs dang mi rigs rnam par shes gyur pas/ ci dga' sdug pa'i rnam rtog byung gyur na// bdag nyid dbang du gyur na// bdag
351b3(mdo 'grel): nyid dbang du gyur pa khrel gyis 'dzem// de ltar rang bzhin rnam dge tshul gyur pas// gzhan la dogs med gzhan gyi dogs mi bya// de phyir de yi bden rjes snyegs tshig/ sangs rgyas grub tshe bsrung ba
351b4(mdo 'grel): med par 'gyur// phra ma dbyen spangs g.yog 'khor mi 'phrog cing // gzhan gyi gnod pas lus mi tshugs te// nan tan lhur byed dad pa dbyer med 'gyur// byams pa sla med 'jigs pa mi
351b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur dang // 'gro don mi gtong snying rje mi nyams 'thob// thub dbang grub tshe slob ma'i dge 'dun yang // tsher byas pa skal pas phye bor mi 'gyur 'grub// khro ba'i rdul mang dbang du gyur pa
351b6(mdo 'grel): la/ rnam rtog rlung gis kun tu 'tshubs pa rnams// grags pa'i lus la grib mar 'gyur ro zhes// zhes gcod rnam pa byams pa'i chus bkrus shing // de las phyi rol tshig snyan 'jam
352a1(mdo 'grel): pa yis// rten bsam pa bde ba'i dbang du 'gyur// 'jig rten dga' ba rtsa ba zug gyur pas// de yi tshig ni kun gyis blang zhing gzung // de phyir
352a2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten rnam par brgyar btul zhing // de dag sdug bsngal lamya ngan bcad bya ste// bsod nams las ldan 'di dang pha rol tu// chos kyi tshul bsrungs ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// rgyang ring
352a3(mdo 'grel): gnas nas za ba gsal grags pa dang // dpe ldan nye nu reng bzhin 'di skye bya// de bzhin 'brug skra za ba la gsal ba yi// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kha yi n+yan kyang byed// 'khyal pa'i chotshig
352a4(mdo 'grel): las phyir log gyur pas nI// mkhas pa rnams ye shin+da tu dben par 'a gro/ de yi blo yang bden par smra mos pas// skyon med che ba nyid kyi ngo nges 'thob bo// bsod nams des na thub po
352a5(mdo 'grel): rgyu la g+hor che// dka' zhing zab pa yongs su bris pa yi// zhu ba rnam myang grangs med dus gcig tu// thogs pa med pa'i tshig gis lung yang smon/ chags sems don med 'di dang
352a6(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu// gnod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub byed blos gsal te// phrag dog med pas bsam pa ji bzhin du// phun sum tshigs pa'i longs spyod rgyas pa'i thob// rnam shes dag pas de pa /
352b1(mdo 'grel): pa yi lus ngag yid kyi las kyang shin tu gtsang // dus dang mthun pas gaskul ba'i mkha' dbyings la// skar tshogs dri med dkyil 'khor ji bzhin 'bar// de yi longs spyod mchog rnams bsod
352b2(mdo 'grel): nams la// rtag tu sbyar ba de yi blo 'jug ste// zhes pa nga rgyal can+da gyi glags med cing // rgyal ba dag gi de ni brtan par 'gyur// de yi las dgyes bsgrubs pa'i bla bras bu bas// dbang
352b3(mdo 'grel): po nam yang nyams pa 'gro ba med// de phyir 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod 'os pa'i// 'khor lo zlog byed ston pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// gnod sems gdung ba'i rims nad yongs
352b4(mdo 'grel): bsal zhing // rang bzhin dge tshul phun sum tshogs pas na// shin tu zhi zhing gsal ba'i ngang tshul gyiso// yid kyi mos pa shin tu gsal bar 'gyur// byams pa'i ro bAde khyad par thob
352b5(mdo 'grel): pas na// 'tshe ba'i tshul lam 'thob mi 'khrug ldan dang // 'phags min spyod pa las ngan rnam pa la// de yi blo ni nam yang 'jug mi 'gyur// las rung 'dzom pa'i yid kyis las ldan
352b6(mdo 'grel): pas// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de la dkon pa mang // 'jig rten kun du 'pho gas dang mnyam 'gyur zhing // 'gro bas lha bzhin gus pas mchod par 'gyur// sems can kun la phan
353a1(mdo 'grel): dga' yang dang yang // dbyar gyis brnyogs pa'i chu klung chu bo dag/ ston dus gsal bas dang bar bya bzhin// 'gro ba kun gyi yid dang ba bskyed// kun
353a2(mdo 'grel): gyi balpA na yid 'od bzang ba dang // ye shes rgyus byung tshul mchog rmad byung ba// 'jig rten rnam shes so sor sgrub pa dag/ sangs rgyas grub tshe rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub// log par
353a3(mdo 'grel): lta ba'i 'dam la mi 'dug na// de bas bsgrubs pa'i grogs dang phrad par 'gyur// rang gi las bzhin 'gyu ra bar lam mthong byas// sdig pa'i lngas rnams de ni yongs su spongs//
353a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba rnams la dang po mi bzlog cing // ngo mtshar bkra shis rnams kyi nyon mongs med// 'phags pa'i lam la gnas pa de 'thob ste// de phyir de ni khyad par 'gro ba 'thob//
353a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig tshegs lha las yang dag 'phags pas na// rgyu rnams rnams zad phyir ngan 'gror de mi gro/ chags med ye shes mchog dang de ldan pas// sa dang mtho ris tshugs pa med par
353a6(mdo 'grel): 'gro/ 'gro ba 'on la mthu che dpa' ba yi// thams cad mkhyen pa myur rgyal dbang chos kyi rnams// nga rgyal la sogs thob par ma gyur pa 'ang // thams cad de la de phyir mngon du 'gyur//
353b1(mdo 'grel): de 'dra'i ljong sna sbyong yon tan rgyan ldan zhing // rang la dbang yod bsgom 'os de dga'i rgyu// mkhas pa su zhig yang drug len mi byed// sems can phan dga' de len ci zhig smros// lha rdzas
353b2(mdo 'grel): dga' rgyu mi yi longs spyod dang // bde mchog ro mchog lha yi phun sum tshogs// tshul khrims rgyus byung ci zhig ngo mtshar che// sangs rgyas chos rnams de las byung ba ltos// tshu la khrims
353b3(mdo 'grel): nyams bas rang don mi nus ni// gzhan don tshul la mthu yod ga la 'ong // de phyir gzhan don legs par brtson pa yis// 'di la rim gro glong par rig pa min// de bas mi bzang 'ji gas
353b4(mdo 'grel): pa mthong bya zhing // s+thing+ge bya zhing // tshul khrims 'dren 'dren rnam pa yongs su spang // gcig tu dkar chos tshogs ni bsags byas shing // rnyog dang rnam br-il+yA tshul ma srang 'os
353b5(mdo 'grel): rgyud yang rnam par spang ba gyos// byang chub sam+b+ha s+thA bas+yA byos tshul khrims dag/ rang gi bad+ma la brkam pas dral mi byA/ bud med lus dang chu la byas mthong sogs pa'i// skabs
353b6(mdo 'grel): kyi nyes pas shag shig tshul mi btsong // mi bsrun skye bo nyon mongs rnam pas kyang // tshul khrims 'dran 'dren rnam po yongs su spang // gcig tu dkar chos tshogs ni bsags byas
354a1(mdo 'grel): shing // rnyog dang rnam bral tshul khrims bsten par bya// rang dbang gyur pas nyams su bde ba dang // mkhas pas bsngags pa'i rgyun ldan tshul khrims
354a2(mdo 'grel): bsrung // bslab pa'i gnas skabs tshang bar yongs rdzogs pa'i// kun rdzob snyems med tshul khrims yang dag bsten// rnam dgra sems la gzugs brnyan gyur pa yi// gzhan don ro cig
354a3(mdo 'grel): sbyor bas de dag bsrung // dran pa'i gzhi ldan dbang po bsdams byas shing // gzhan gdong lci ba'i re baM med par bya// chu la khrims bsrung la shin tu brtson par bya// 'jig rten tshul khrims
354a4(mdo 'grel): 'chal pa mang po'i mun// nyi ma'i 'od kyis gsal ba ji bzhin gsal// sdug bsngal gnyen po'i don du bden pa dang // lus kyi rma sku'i rdul lnga sogs pa dang // rigs pas 'thob
354a5(mdo 'grel): pas cho ga bsam byas shing // gzhon gdong lta ba'i re ba med par bya// tshul dang mi thun zhing yon tan 'byung ba'i rgyu// yid bzhin dag ba kun gyi spyod gyur kyang // ngo mtshar med pas
354a6(mdo 'grel): rgyal spang bya zhing // de las byung ba'i grags ma bsnyems mi bya// thob pa'i yon tan rnam pa gzugs brnyan dag/ mdza' ba'i tshul gyi da gra dang nye ba bzhin// pad+ma ma'i
354b1(mdo 'grel): nags la zla ba'i 'od gsal gyur// brtul zhugs lhod pa rnams la bde ba gnod// tshul khrims yon tan bsgom bya'i tshul du gsungs// yon tan ma lus byang chub sems la
354b2(mdo 'grel): gnas// byang chub mchog sems snying rje'i rgyu las byung // de bas snying rje'i ngang tshul ldan par bya// gang zhig 'dod pa'o// khams la mi gnas shing // gzugs kyi khams la
354b3(mdo 'grel): 'ang de bzhin mi gnas te// gzugs med/ bem sa la'ang de bzhin mi rten pa// de ni tshul tshul khrimaso yang dag yin par brjod// gang zhig 'jig rten dpag yas sems can da
354b4(mdo 'grel): mtha' dag tshul khrims bdug la dgod mos shing // 'jig rten rngan phyir tshul khrims sbyin byed pa// de ni tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs// de bas dran song 'jigs dang
354b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal srid dang // mtho rIs phun sum tshogs pa smon btsal te// tshul khrims dri med yong dag bsrung bya zhing // 'jig rten don la brtson pas tshul khrims bste nA// chul
354b6(mdo 'grel): khrims de ni khyad par thob pa'i lam// snying rjes dang can rnams dang mnyam par bsgrub// ye shes gtsang ma lus kyi rang bzhin te// skyon bral rgyan du 'gyur ba'i mchog ces bya//
355a1(mdo 'grel): khams gsum kun du yid 'ong dri bsrung dang // rab tu byung dang mi 'gal byug pa yin// tshwa lugs mthun yang tshul khrims ldan gyur na// mi
355a2(mdo 'grel): yi nang na de ni 'phags par 'gyur// tshig tu ma brjid chagasu mr-i gyur kyang/ nyams su mkho be'i longs spyod rim gro 'du// bsdigs pa med par 'jig rten kun s+phude de// chags
355a3(mdo 'grel): med ma bsgrubs dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// brjod du mi 'os rigs su 'byung ba dang // phan zhing dben po gang yang ma byas shing // sngan chang mi shes skye bo thams cad
355a4(mdo 'grel): dang / tshul khrims ldan pa'i skye bo de la 'dud// rkang pas bkra shis gyur pa'i rdul dag kyang // spyi gtsug dam pos blangs shing lha dang mi// phyag 'tshal mgos gar+b+hag
355a5(mdo 'grel): thob pa kun du mkhyer// de phyir tshul khrims dpel ldan rigs mchog yin// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o// // bdud rnam
355a6(mdo 'grel): thams cad yongs su rmongs byed cing // rnam thar thob byed bde bar gsungs pa'i// bzod pa shin tu phan po sgrub byed pa// de la su zhig ta nan tan mi byed yod// gzhan la gnod
355b1(mdo 'grel): byed nam yang mi shes bya// brtan pa rnams kyi rgyun gyi dam pa yid 'ong dang tshul te// 'jig rten don byed snying rje'i tshul snyems pa// yon tan mthun pa'i ming ni bzod pa yin//
355b2(mdo 'grel): gzhan don mthun pa'i ying dang ldan pa li// tshul gyi dam pa bzod pa yin zhes gsungs// 'jig rten legs pa phun sum tshogs pa dag/ khro ba'i skyon la bzod pas yongs su skyo ba
355b3(mdo 'grel): g+na ldan+da rnams kyi rgyun gyi dam pa ste// dka' thub tshul 'chang rnams la stobs kyi tshul// gnod sems 'brog gi mi la chu yi rgyun// 'di la gzhan la gnod dgra bzod pas so'o//
355b4(mdo 'grel): mchog gi bzod pa'i tshig ste// mi bsgyun skye ba'i tshogs gis spangs skyugs pabuM// de dge bstod pa'i me drug bzod rgyu cing // grags pa'i zung ba yid du 'ong bar 'gyu
355b5(mdo 'grel): skye bo gdug pa'i ngag gi mtshon gyis rmya// yi shaM sI zla ba bzhin du sim par bye du// brtul zhugs 'chung ba brtan pa'i rang bzhin tAM// bzod pa de ni yon tan tshogs kyi gnas//
355b6(mdo 'grel): thob cing brtan pa'i snying por gyur pa ste// khro ba'i gdung ba gzhil ba dbyar dang 'dra// yon tan rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis brlabs pa yi// sgra snyan khyab pa bzod pa'i mthu las byung // tshangs
356a1(mdo 'grel): ris 'jig rten dag tu 'adz+nye gad+hU pa la// skad kyi them bzhin te skyo bya'i skyon dang bral// yon tana? mdzes ldan+da mtshan rab brgyun pa yi// gzum
356a2(mdo 'grel): bsgrub bzo yi gnas kyang bzod pa'i yin// skyon gyi shing chen kho na bzod chu bo bzhin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis spel ba yi// bsod nams chu yi tshogs dang
356a3(mdo 'grel): rtag/ tu mthun// 'jig rten gzhan du phan dge rdzogs par sgrub// 'gro le phon don 'phel ba'i mchog kyong yin// grags pa'i snyan pa'i rang bzhin+da phulnga gyi rgyu// yon tan
356a4(mdo 'grel): yid bsgrub glanas kyang bzod pa yin// snying rjes sems can dben par mthong byas na// 'khor bya'i nyes pas de ni skyo mi 'gyur// rang gi lngas dge 'jig rten phan byed
356a5(mdo 'grel): pas/ 'jig rten kun tu grags pa'i cho gas smre 'gyur// ye shes mchog gis sbyangs bya'i bzod ldan na// mtshon 'dzin dpya ba kun gyis 'ge ba med// mi rtog
356a6(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i mthu dang ldan pas na// bde ba'i rnam pas dga' bar 'gyur pa med// gnod pa'i rnam pa mi bzang mang pos kyang // skyes mchog de dag yid ni 'gyur ba
356b1(mdo 'grel): med// bzod pa'i stobs kyi shin tu brtan pa na// byang chub mchog sgrub mos pa mang bar 'gyur// bzod pas brtan pa'i spyod bya dam pa des// dka' thub dka' ba kun du ston
356b2(mdo 'grel): byed cing // mu ste gis dregs pas mtho ba'i bsam po dge/ phan pa'i bsam pas bcil zhing dma' bar byed// 'jig rten rmongs pa bdagu snyam chags gyur te// lhag
356b3(mdo 'grel): ma gzhan skam du rgyal 'chang ba dag/ de yi gnod pas zil gnon sems gyur cing // gzod dang mi ldan yongasu gdung bar 'gyur// skyes mchog bsam pa'i snying rje'i mgon
356b4(mdo 'grel): ldan cing // bzod pas byAkra shIs bsgrubs pa 'chung ba dang // bdag tu b.lAM ba yongs su sbyangs pa lA// gnod byung gzhan dang nyaM yang gnod pa med// brtan pa nyam chung sems
356b5(mdo 'grel): kyi skyon gyur ba'i// khro bI log pa rnam par rtog las byung // yong dag rtog pa yid la zhi skyed cing // bzod pa'i rnam par gzhog par byed// chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan
356b6(mdo 'grel): yod 'dra ba'i// bzod pa'i rnam rtog zhi la brtan pa las// 'phags pas rtag tu skabs med 'phags par bya// rnam rtog zhi ba don dam bzod pa zhes// bzod pa'i yang dag
357a1(mdo 'grel): nyid mkhyen de dag gsung // de bas 'jig rten mi 'dra rtogs bya zhing // rnam rtog nye bar zhi bA la nAn tan gyis// mig ni mig tu zud na ci skye khro//
357a2(mdo 'grel): rna ba la sogs der zung khro med ces// de ltar gang bzod skye mched ltos pa ste// de ni don dam nyid du bzod pa minI// sgra dang tshig ni mi rtag rang bzhin te// sgra dang tshig ni mi
357a3(mdo 'grel): rnam rtog 'di yang mi rtag ces/ gang bzod dri ni mi rtag rtog pa ste// bzod pa'i mchog tu dri yang gsungs pa yin// nyes pa byed pa gang la 'ang yod pa min// gang la bya ba
357a4(mdo 'grel): de yang med do zhes// gang bzod de ni bzod de bdag med sbyar ba ste// de yang bzod pa'i phul tu phyin pa min// de dang sdug bsngal bstod dang smad pa dag/ kun kyang rten
357a5(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel 'byung dngos po zhes// gang bzod de ni rten 'a bre lA rtogs bye'i sa// bzod pa shin+ma tu mnyam gzhug de ma yin// 'di ni yongasu rmodris pas bslus gyur pas// /
357a6(mdo 'grel): bsam pa log gyur de 'dra bdag min zhes// gang bzod de ni mtho dmon bsam pa ste// bsod pa'i phul gyi go skabs de la med// sgra skad yi ge sgra snyan ji bzhin te/
357b1(mdo 'grel): re re brjod cing de bzhin 'jigs pas nA// su la su zhig ji ltar gnod 'gyur zhes// bzod pa de yang bzod pa'i phul ma yin// 'di bdag gi sdig pa zad bya'i phyir// rang gi chos la gnod pa
357b2(mdo 'grel): 'dra mi lta na// bde gshegs dum pa ci rob ma yin zhes// gang bzod de ni ming tsam brjod pa min// rang gi las bzhin 'gyur ba rtogs bya zhing // de yid yon tan rdzogs pas bzod byed pa// de 'dri'i/
357b3(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'ang rnam rtog sbyor can te// bzod pa'i mthar phyin mchog mi de ma yin// mi rtag sdug bsngal mi gtsang bdag med pa// bdag la bzod kyi bzlog pa ma yin zhes// gang yin de ni gnyen po zhes
357b4(mdo 'grel): brjod kyi// gnyis kyis rjes 'brang don dum bzod pa min// skye bo 'di ni yang dag mi shes pas// de phyir gzhan la gnod par dga' ba'o zhes// gang bzod de yang mnyam nyid mnyam mi 'gro//
357b5(mdo 'grel): bzod pa de yang rnam rtog skyon can yin// mtho dman mAnyam pa'i rnam rtog rnam drug/ gong tshe ma lus yang dag zhi gyur pa// de ni bzod pa bla med dam pa zhes// gnyis med
357b6(mdo 'grel): lam la spyod pa de dag gsung // rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga rgyu med las// dngos po gang yang 'byung ba med pa dang // rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga rgyu med las// dngos
358a1(mdo 'grel): po gang yang 'jig par 'gyur ba med// yod dang med la skye ba med pas na// skye ba med phyir gang yang 'gag pa med// dngos ma rtog
358a2(mdo 'grel): dang bsan skyeng pa nyi yang dang dag mthong na bzod pa'i phel zhes bya// de thob gyur no rgyal ba 'dir 'gyur zhes// rgyal ba rnam gyis rnam mang lung yang dag mnamigazhag
358a3(mdo 'grel): bstan// nga ga yang ma gzhag kyang // 'jig rten phan 'dod grangs med kun tu 'byung // chos dang smon lam las la dpa thob ste// mos pa rdzu 'phrul skye pa'i dab yang
358a4(mdo 'grel): da bzhin/ mas dang bya pa dang / ye shes mchog dang tshe la dbyung ba thob// dbang gi nor ma cho ga yun du mi zad cing // gzhan dan che sgrub de 'dra thob gyur nas// 'o gro pa'i rgyan
358a5(mdo 'grel): tuk+ta ga pas/ yongs su y-i dung phyir dbang ldan du dag skye// de phyir gzhan don phal cher bkur spro bas// bzod pa thabs tshul 'di 'dra bsnyen par bya// de la gnas la dbang gzhan don sdebs pa
358a6(mdo 'grel): yul yon can 'bras rkyen ldan 'gyur// 'di la dad pa rtsa ba brtan gyur na// des kyang thub rgyal nges par 'gyur zhes gsungs// chos kyi lam la dad pa rgyun chags na// bsam pa yi
358b1(mdo 'grel): chags mi 'gyur// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o// // thams cad bzod pa'i mthu ni skyes gyur nas// spyod pa'i mthu chen mtha' dka' brtson 'grus kyis// dpa' bo rtul
358b2(mdo 'grel): zhugs thams cad rtson byed pas// lha 'am bdud rnams las kyang 'phags par 'gro/ tshe 'dir mthar phyir 'jig rten do nr-i dag kyang / ba rtsen 'grus med pas mthar phyin bye bya dka'// yongs su skyo med
358b3(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus che ldan no// mi 'thob mi 'grub rnam pa gang yang med// skye bo ma rab thog mor brtsams mi mos// brtsams nas dbus su sgyid lug brtson 'grus gtong
358b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan don del med brtson 'grus ldan pa no// mya ngan 'das spyod spyod pa rgya chen rtsom// la las bslus pa'i 'gal phal cher ni// brtson 'grus rang dbang yod kyang bdag da
358b5(mdo 'grel): gtong // brtson 'grus rang dbang yod kyang che ljon gzhan la ltos med ni// gzhan don khrur chen spro ba med par 'khyer// sna phyi 'khor ba'i mtha' dang mnyam tsam du// rgya che ring
358b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i nyin dang mtshan gyur la// de 'dra bsags pas lo gyur dus ring ba'i// bskal pa rgya mtsho'i chu thogs grangs snyed kyis// byang chub mchog sems gcig skye 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i rnaM pA tsha Da gzha de re zhi/ bsku dag gyur/
359a1(mdo 'grel): rjes spyo bsal te// byang chub dam pa sgyid lug med par sgrub/ 'khor chen tshe ring gi sdug sngal sems btung zhing // so cha brtan pa dang ga ya snang bsgyung ma/ partul zhugs dpa' bo snying
359a2(mdo 'grel): rje'i ba sanA lA blangs pa dang po yin par brjod// 'jig rten mes bkang rkang gi snga 'bog bya zhing // sa chen mtshan gyis dkrigs pa gzigs byas te// bde gshegs lta bar mos dang gang ldan zhing // chos
359a3(mdo 'grel): kyi bdud rtsi zhi mchog bskad dang // 'khor bu'i 'das nas skye bo 'di dag kun// bdag gisnga bton te byang chub bde dgos ces// goms pa bteg cing bor ba'i dus ngag tu// gang zhig de 'drar mnyam 'jogs
359a4(mdo 'grel): sems 'chab dang / 'jig rten phun phyir brtson 'grus baMskyed cing // gzhan lA phan pa'i bsod nams ma grub pa// de ni mi bzang pa yi brtson 'grus te// dpal ldan yang dag blangs pa gnyis zhes bya// bsod
359a5(mdo 'grel): nams rnam pa sgrub dus na yang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bsngo byed na// de ni mi zad yang dag bsgrub pa'i phyir// yang dag len pa'i mchog ces thub pas gsungs// rgya mtsho chen por chu thigs gcig bor ba//
359a6(mdo 'grel): rgya mtsho ma zad dus su zad mi 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub mchog tu bsngos pa yi// bsod nams rnam pa zad par 'gyur ba med// de yang snying rje rnam dag sems ldan zhing // 'gro ba rgyu dang mi sgyu ma lus kun// rnam
359b1(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen par bsgrub bya zhes// sems can dam pa bsod nams de dag rtsom// stong gsum chen po'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa// nyi ma gcig gi la la sgrol byed la// bsgral pa du mar de bzhin bsgral byas kyang //
359b2(mdo 'grel): sems can khams lasu mang po ma bsgral zhes// sems can mi zad de 'dra thos gyur kyang // ma lus sems can bsgral bar rab mos shing // sgying lugs skyon gyes ma bzung brtson ldan na// don gyis snying
359b3(mdo 'grel): b+ho de la ring ba min// 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gcig bsgrubs pa// de snyed bcu 'gyur bsgyur bas bde gshegs kyi// ba spu'i khung gcig mngon par 'grub 'gyur lnga// spu rnams gcig nas re rer mngon 'grus
359b4(mdo 'grel): cing // ba spu mngon sgrub bsod nams de dag tshogs// ban+d+ha'i gyur dag tu bsgyur ba'i bstod nams kyis// dpe byad bzang gcig 'grub cing de bzhin du// dpe byad bzang po'i lhag ma kun 'grub cing // dpe byad
359b5(mdo 'grel): bzang pos bsdus pa 'i bsod nams tshogs// de snyed stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par sangs rgyas tshe// mtshan rab sna tshogs re re 'grub 'gyur lo// mtshan rab skyed pa'i
359b6(mdo 'grel): bsod nams rgyur gyur te// stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams phung po las// zla ba nya ltar mdzes shing gsal ba yi// mdzod sku mdog bzang yid 'ong 'grub 'gyur ba// mdzod spu mngon sgrub bsod nams de snyed
360a1(mdo 'grel): @#tshogs// brgya 'gyur stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba'i mtshan ldan pa'i// gtsug tor rgyan mdzes sangs rgyas dbu 'grub ste// de 'dra'i bsod nams sgrub tshul
360a2(mdo 'grel): de dag kyang // bdag gis bsgrub ces byang chub sems mthong na// brtson 'grus 'dor ba de la gang gi sgor// sgyid lug le lo'i cha shas skabs su 'gyur// 'jig rten khams kun sems can ma lus par// rang
360a3(mdo 'grel): rgyal rnams dang thams cad 'drar gyur kyang // bzod la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig/ ye shes dam pas de dag kun pas 'phags// de snyed bzod pa'i stobs la gnas pa bas// mi ldog byang chub
360a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' gcig 'phags te// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das pa yI// dge la bsgrub pa de ni ngal mi shes// mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' de snyed pas// skye ba gcig thogs rgyal sras de 'phags te//
360a5(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus brtan dang ldan pa'i nang na yang // byang chub shi drung phyin pa ci zhig smos// rnam pa de 'dra'i ye shes rnam dag dang // 'jig rten ma lus sems can kun+da ldan yang // byang chub snying po'i shing drung
360a6(mdo 'grel): phyin gyur la// bdud 'dul skye ba tha ma'i char mi 'gro/ de 'dra'i ye shes rnam pa dag ldan pas// 'jig rten ma lus kun gang gyur kyang // yon tan rnam mang de dag gcig sogs pas/ bde gshegs stobs
360b1(mdo 'grel): kyi cha la 'ang mnyam mi 'gro/ de 'dra'i ye shes rgya mtsho rmad byung ba// gzhan sems shes pa'i mthu la thogs med cing // ye shes snang ba mkha' lhar yangs // snying rje ldan pa gcig pu pha rol rgal// sems can
360b2(mdo 'grel): ma lus kun la khyab pa yi// snying rje chen po 'jig rten kun tu 'byung // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rnam pa dag/ rmad byung ma lus de phyir yang dag klu / 'dra'i sems can dma' bas mnyan dga' ba'i// yang dag
360b3(mdo 'grel): blangs pa'i yon tan kun ldan na// yang dag nyid lam yan lag brgyad ldan bzhin// brtson 'grus phul byung shin tu rnam par mdzes// brtson 'gru rnams/ sum dge ba sbyor ba ste// lus dang ngagu yid brtson
360b4(mdo 'grel): 'grus rnam pa las// 'jug dang gnas dang mnyam par bzhag pa yi// brtson 'grus phul byung yid las byung ba yin// byang chub sems la mos shing zhi ba dang / snying rje che dang bdag med bzo ba dang // 'gro ba sdug
360b5(mdo 'grel): bsngal bsdu ba rnam bzhi dang // chos rnams kun la yongs su 'dzin med dang // 'khor ba'i 'dam na yongs su skyo med dang // khams gsum thams cad nye bar mi dmigs shing // bdog pa kun gtong nga rgyal 'gyur
360b6(mdo 'grel): med dang // bslab pa kun la yang dge slob pa dang // gzhan gyi gnod pas mi 'gyur brtan ldan zhing // sems la rnam 'khrug nam yang mi 'byung dang // dge ba'i las la brtson pa brtan pa dang / dben la dga'
361a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i ro gcis sems ldan dang // bsam gtan bzhi po mnyam par gzhog pa dang // bdag med nges par rtogs pa'i sems ldan dang // thos pa mang pos ngoms par mi 'gyur zhing // rigs par 'jug
361a2(mdo 'grel): cing de la rtog pa dang / ji ltar thos pa yang dag ston byed cing // brjod med chos nyid yang dag shes pa dang // mngon shes lnga la mthu chen ldan pa dang // mngon shes drug la skom tsam byed pa dang // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon par
361a3(mdo 'grel): sgrub pa dang / spyod pa tshogs med shin tu bsal ba dang // yang dge spong la sbyor ba byed pa dang // dge dang mi dge'i phyogs las rnam grol zhing // dbang po nges par bya la mkhas po dang // chos rnams dbang po med
361a4(mdo 'grel): sa gyur tsa // tshogs rnams yongs su tshe lnga byed kyang // gar yang 'gro med rmad byung zab pa dang // de la sogs pa sems spangs brtson pa'i/ dge ba cing dgod pa'i khyad par mags#
361a5(mdo 'grel): de nyid mi bye'i phyir// dngon pa'i brtson 'grus khyad par rgyu yang yin// ye shes mchog gi las la gnas 'cha'amau/ saM
361a6(mdo 'grel): 'jas byas la ka de 'gos che yid 'dus byas med mi ltung // sngon chang ma thos chos thos gnod pa med// cis kyang mi tshugs thos pa'i kyang 'dzin// ma yin kun
361b1(mdo 'grel): ting 'dzin rnam pa kun kyang thob par 'gyur// nyin mtshan dus rnams 'bras bu yod par zla// yon tan tshogs kyi dmu' bAR+Sha 'gyur ba med// mi ya chos las 'phags pa'i don rnams kyis// me tog at+ma
361b2(mdo 'grel): lnga bzhin rnam par 'phel// grags pa yangs dang bde ba thob par 'gyur// ser sna dog spangs yid tshul mchog kyang 'thob// tshe 'di'i yon tan ji snyed snang ba kun// brtson pa'i tshul 'byung yon tan che ba med// yon tan
361b3(mdo 'grel): rje mnga' rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// khams gsum mchod 'os nyid kyang de lis grub// brtson 'grus chen po'i yon tan de 'dra na// brtson 'grus che la gang zhig brtson mi byed// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
361b4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa'i le'u'o// // de nas ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// bsam gtan tshul la brtson par bya// 'jig rten pa'i rnam pa dag/ ye shes snang bas bde bar 'grub// bsam gtan tshul gyis sems ngag ma/
361b5(mdo 'grel): ston gyi dus kyi sprin bsal ba'i// mkha' lnga zla ba gsal ba ltar// ye shes khyad du dang bar 'gyur// rnam dag tshul khrims ldan byas shing // dge phan grog swA dang bsten byas te// byA ba nyung zhing zhi ba'i ngang //
361b6(mdo 'grel): dran pas byin brlabs tshul bcangs te// shing drung brtul zhugs gnas dag gam// ne'u gsing sdug gu'i sa gzhi 'am// tsheng du ma byas mdangs dga' ba'i// nags kyi me tog dri zhim pa 'am// bsam
362a1(mdo 'grel): gtan rkyen du 'os pa yi// cho ga shes 'gro ba'i gnas ngag gam// 'gro ba'i sgra skad myi 'byung bar// zab mor gnas pa'i gnas dag gram// dgon pa'i sa gzhi bzang po 'am// stong pa'i gnas
362a2(mdo 'grel): dang khyim dag gAm// sman ljongs ri khrod dben pa dag/ seng ge'i nga ro grag gnas sam// 'du 'dzi'i nyon mongs dben gyur pa'i// gang yang rung ba'i gnas dag tu// skyil mo bkrung du bder 'dug ste//
362a3(mdo 'grel): drang po'i lus ni bsrung byas shing // dran pa'i bsrung ba sems gzhi la// nye bar yang dag bzhag bya ste// snying rjes log par rtogs pa rnams// skabs med tshul du dam bcas shing // shes par rab shes
362a4(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i dus// 'di yin mya ngan 'das dus min// sems can mya ngan ma 'das su// mya dran 'da' bar mos med ces// de ltar 'jig rten phan bsam te// sangs rgyas nyid du mos bskyed cing // rgyun mi
362a5(mdo 'grel): 'chad pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsam gtan bsgrub la brtson par bya// yang dang yang zhing ngal bso na// gtsubs pa mAM phyin mi 'gyur te// rnal 'byor tshul la 'ong de bzhin du// khyod pa ma thob btang
362a6(mdo 'grel): mi bya// dmigs pa gcig la brtan tshul du// yid kyi bsam pa brtan par bya// dmigs pa mang po rgyud pa las// 'di ni nyon mongs 'khrug par 'gyur// lhag mthong brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthus//
362b1(mdo 'grel): zhum+b+ha par gyur na gzeng yang bstod// rgod par glang tshe gyur pa'i yid// zhi gnas tshul gyis bzlog par bya// ting 'dzin mthu ni mi g.yo zhing // yang dag gyuraru na btang snyoms gzhag/ bde gshegs ting
362b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin thob bya'i phyir// de la chags par yod mi bya// bsam gtan dga' ba'i ro myong bas// rang dbyung med pa'i nyam mI blang // bdag gI bde tsam 'thob don du// brtsa lnga pa rgya chen 'di sgrub min// lus
362b3(mdo 'grel): dang srog la lta ba yi// zhum pas non gyur sems gyur cing // rang gi mgo bo tshig gyur kyang // brtson 'grus par nges mi bya// mtshan ma'i rnam pa shes byas shing // yid ni mnyam par ba zhag pa'i phyir//
362b4(mdo 'grel): dmigs las bsam pa nyams gyur na// dran pas phyir yang bsdu bar bya// sgrib pA rnam sa las rang gi yid// glang po rang dbang 'thob 'gyur na// lcags kyus bzlog par bya ba bzhin// logs pa'i phyogs
362b5(mdo 'grel): las bzlog par bya// de nas sgrib pa'i nad kyi rnams// bsngal bas seMs pa'i yid gyur cing // dbul po nyi ma thag phyongs pa las// longs spyod skying thob thar pa bzhin// bde dang ldan pa'i yid kyi sna ni//
362b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa'i skyon rnams bsal bar bya// de dang brel bas dmigs pa yi// bde ba gcig nas gcig brgyud kyang // glog lngaras rtag 'gyur ba dang // dbu ba gsog ltar bdag med pa'i// rmi lam bzhin du
363a1(mdo 'grel): don med dor// bslu ba'i don du 'ongs 'dra dor// pa rnams bu la byams pa dang // bla rnams pha la de bzhin te// mdza' la mdza' bo byams pa dang // 'gro rnams phan tshun byams pa dag/ yon tan tshogs
363a2(mdo 'grel): kyis bsgrubs byas shing // brtan pa'i snying pos brtan byas te// g.yul du gru gdong 'dren bzhin gyis// mdza' byams mtshams 'jigs byed kyang // 'di tshe brtsal ba'i sdug bsngal dang // gzhan du dran 'gro skyed
363a3(mdo 'grel): byed pa'o// rgyur gyur 'dod pa'i rnam pa yin// de bas 'dod pa bstan mi bya// rnam rtog rnams kyi gzhir gyur cing // bdag dang gzhan rnams kun gyi yang // shes rab mig ljongs byed pa'i rgyu// mi bde su tshogs
363a4(mdo 'grel): skyed pa yang // bdag 'dod don la brtson par bya// rnam pa kun du yongs sbyangs pa'i// 'dod pa de dag gzhin don la// brtson pas dran byar 'os pa yin// 'dod pa de dag thob pa dang // nyin gcig bzhin du bsten
363a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang // mang dang bsags pas mi ngoms na// de las nad che gang zhig yod// btsal tshe ro med nyon mongs la// bsrung tshe 'jigs pa skyed byed cing // med gyur mya ngan che skyed na// mi de la 'dod byed su zhig yod//
363a6(mdo 'grel): gang gi ro la myos gyur na// rang don nyid kyang mi rig ste// myos 'gyur spyon chu ji bzhin pa'i// 'dod pa sems ldan su zhig skyed// ji ltar rnam pa thams cad du// 'dod pa skyon ldan shes gyur na//
363b1(mdo 'grel): las sems ni ldog 'gyur te// 'byung lam chos la mos par 'gyur// dben las skyes pa'i dga' drang bde// dgra yang thob las skyes pa 'byung // yan lag de dang ldan pas nA// bsam gtan dang po
363b2(mdo 'grel): thob pa yin// der ni rnam rtog rnam spyod drag/ 'dod ldan skyon ldan ma thong 'gyur cing // ngo dag zhi ba tshol byed pas// ting 'dzin dga' skyes bde ba 'thob// nang ni yongs su dang gyur zhing // de sems rtse gcig
363b3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa ni// bsnam gtan gnyis pa'i bsam gtan zhes// gnyis ming drang srong mchog gis gsungs// yid kyi 'khrug long yin shes nas// dga' las 'dod chags bral gyur pa// dran pa byatang
363b4(mdo 'grel): snyoms ldan pa yi// bsam gtan gsum pa thob par 'gyur// bde ba'i bsam pa yongs btang bas// bde dang sdug bsngal meng gyur cing // btang snyoms dran pas rnam dgu pa'i// bsam gtan bzhi pa thob par
363b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur// de nas mngon shes lnga thob ste// chos rgyal rgyal srid gnas pa na// dpal ldan grags pa khrel dang gzungs// de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// gzhan gyi don du mngon bsgrubs pas// rang rgyal nyan thos
363b6(mdo 'grel): yon tan la// de dag shin tu 'das gyur cing // shin tu khyad 'phags mthu dang ldan// gtong la 'jungs pa 'gong byed cing // tshul khrims med pa tshul la 'god// khro ba bzod cing nges pa dang // sgyid lug brtson
364a1(mdo 'grel): 'grus chen po dang // 'khrug pa'i sems ldan bsdum gtan dang // shes rab 'chal pa shes rab la// snying rje chen po skyo med par// brtson 'grus spyod pas sbyor ba byed// de nas mtha' yas
364a2(mdo 'grel): spyod yul can// nyi ma 'ong chen ji bzhin du// mi nyams gsal ba'i 'od chen gyis// 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byed// de nas sems can sdig can dag/ ngan 'gror ltung bar gyur pa dang // bsod nams tshe
364a3(mdo 'grel): dag zang gyur cing // lha las ltung bar gyur pa dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal de dang nges// yongs su gdung bar gyur pa dag/ 'jig rten khams na gang yod pa// lha mo'i gsal bas mthong gyur cing
364a4(mdo 'grel): snying rje chen po skye 'gyur te// snying rje ldan pas dag med spong // gzhan don sgrib la bag yod pas// bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dang ldan// dri nas 'jig rten khams mang na// de bzhin gshegs pa mang bzhug
364a5(mdo 'grel): dang sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyan dag dang // dge 'dun phun sum tshogs m+b+ha thong zhing // byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog gi/ rnam dge spyod yul spyod mthong ste// sems can gzhan lnga phan don du// dpral
364a6(mdo 'grel): ldan spyod pa mthong gyur pas// de la smon lam che skyed cing // smon lam dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur te// gzhan don rgya chen sngo byed pas// rgyal sras tshul mchog yongs su 'grub// mi las 'das pa'i rna
364b1(mdo 'grel): s+ho// khyA yi nA ba rnam dag pas// rgyung rong sgra rnams nye ba bzhin// tshe chung rnam pa kun thos shing // sgyeng ban+d+ha med pas gang smras pa'o// zhwa gtsang ro myang TIg gi nams// khro ba'i me las byung ba yi// mye sdug
364b2(mdo 'grel): rgal 'dra thos gyur cing // lha mo'i glu ro skan bya dang // rgyun gyi phar phur sil khrol dang // lha rdzas rol mo'i sgra snyan pas// mi rtag tshul thos sgra thos shing // 'jigs dang sdug bsngal rnam pa las// mi bzad
364b3(mdo 'grel): mya ngan drug po'i sgra/ nyon mongs nyams bab thos pa dgra/ mi dga'i rnam pa thos gyur na// bskul ma drug pos bsgral ba bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' mthu ldan zhing // khong nas snying rje che ldan te// brtson 'grus
364b4(mdo 'grel): mchog ni brtso ma par byed// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'jigs pa yi// bde gshegs rnams la so chos thos te// mya ngan 'das la mos pa'i blos// sems can don mang bsgrub par byed// gzhan sems tshul la de
364b5(mdo 'grel): mkhas shing // bag lA ny+dzal dang bla sama? shwe s+yai b+hAs+ya// ye shrIs yo byung ldan pa de// bsod nams sgra grwa gsar yang skyed// bskul pa bye ba mang po yi// ston gyi gnas rnams rjes dran zhing // 'jig rten bsod
364b6(mdo 'grel): nams rnam pa dang // stobs dang stobs ming mthong gyur nas// de dag bsam pa'i tshul bzhin du// rdzu 'phrul rnam pos lus bsgyur cing // snod bzhin stong par byed pas na// don yod rjod byed mchog tu 'gyur
365a1(mdo 'grel): @la lar gzugs mdzes phun ldan zhing // nyi ma brgyad lha'i 'od ldan te// ri mo gasngal ba'i mtshan rgyas pa// thub rgyal mtshan lhun sku mchog gis// 'gro ba'i mig la brade skyed cing // yid la khrub
365a2(mdo 'grel): par sim byed pas// rgyal dbang mos pa byang chub tu// bsgrub phyir 'chi med sbyin byed// thub dbang zhi tshul dpal ldan pa'i// stong pa rnam par spong byed cing // la lar 'dul dbang ji bzhin du// slob ma'i tshul gyi
365a3(mdo 'grel): 'dul bar byed// la lAr lha dpung brgya byin bzhin// lce yi spyi bo zhabs la 'gyur// sbyin ji bzhin nor mang gtong // le lcer tshangs wAr gzungs mchog 'dzin// la lar spyan gsum phye bA ste// dri meng zla ba'i rgyun ldan
365a4(mdo 'grel): ston// la lar lha mi'i rgyal po dang // klu yi dpal tshon khyer ba ston// la la gcod sbyin rgyal po ltar// rdo rje 'bar ba thogs pa ston// yon tan 'ang ldan thub zla lhur// lo lar gsang gzhi mtshan bstan ston// la
365a5(mdo 'grel): lar brgya byin nor bu yis// brang la 'od 'bar mdzes pa ston// la lar chu yi lha gzugs dang // la lngar 'dod pa'i lha lhur ston// la lar bud med gzugs mdzes dang // la lcar pho smos dga' ba ston// la lar
365a6(mdo 'grel): brtul zhugs nor ldan te// 'dod las 'dod chags bral ba ston// la lar mi rnams yid 'phrog cing // slob dpon slob ma rgyal po byed// la lar mthu chen byin brlabs kyis// ngani song sdug bsngal rnam mang
365b1(mdo 'grel): sel du/ 'gro bya'i dad pa tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs spyod pa las bstan cing // snying rje'i yon tan rgya che bas// 'jig rten phan la grangs med byed// bsam gtan 'di 'dra'i gnas thob cing // khyad par phun
365b2(mdo 'grel): sum tshogs thob pas// gter gyi mtshan mi slu med bzhin// khyad par gong nas gong brtson bya// de la gnas 'cha' yan bor cing // brtul zhugs lhod pa'i tshul bor te// dge ba spel phyir brtson par bya// de las
365b3(mdo 'grel): bzlog pa dman par 'gro// ting 'dzin brtson pa myed pa ste// rjes su bsgrub pa dkon pas na// rnam par rgyal ba 'dod rnams kyis/ zhi ba'i gnyen po tshugs med bsten// yid tshul spangs pa'i mchog gyur kyang //
365b4(mdo 'grel): sa ltar mi g.yo brtan pa yi// sa mchog mi g.yo ma thob tu// de la yid brtan g.yo mi bya// mngon par 'dus byas lam byas pa// ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'ang 'jig par 'gyur// de bas rnam rtog rnam spangs te//
365b5(mdo 'grel): lam gyi dam pa bsgom par bya// bde gtsang rtag pa'i rnam rtog drug/ 'dus byas slu bri'i chos can du// yang dag rtogs par shes bya ste// ngo ngos po'i rnam rtog yongs su spang // dmigs pa chung yang byung
365b6(mdo 'grel): gyur na// nyon mongs mangs btsag gzhir yang 'gyur// ngo 'dra'i gnod pa kun pa cil na// bdud kyi spyod yul 'das par 'gyur// gnas pa'i skyon dang ldan gyur na// bsam gtan rnam ngag tshul mi 'gyur/
366a1(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i rjes 'brang nyams pa ste// dong skam bcas zhes de phyir brjod// tha snyad tshul dag 'grub don du// de ni 'jig rten lam zhes bya// yod dang med byung gtad med pas// gang na 'ang ci yang skye
366a2(mdo 'grel): ba med// nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra yid ldan na// srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang bral// tshul 'chos bral ba'i spyod brtan la// kha gsag med pa'i tshul ldan na// 'jig rten spyod pa de byed kyang // 'gro ba gcig tu phan pa spyod//
366a3(mdo 'grel): sems la dbang gyur thob pas na// ting 'dzin stobs las nyams pa med// de thob yan chad rmad byung ba'i// ting 'dzin 'bras bu mang ldan pas// dbyar dus rgya mtsho chu klung dag/ chu gser byung bas skye zhing 'phel// bsam
366a4(mdo 'grel): gtun gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o// // sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod namA sA 'di dag ni// shes rab mgon bcas lhag par mthu ldan 'gyur// gser gyi rgyan bzang rnam pa sna tshogs la// rin chen 'phra
366a5(mdo 'grel): bkod 'od kyis gsal ba bzhin// so so'i don la de dog yon tan mthu// shes rab 'di nyid rgya chen sgrub par byed// dpa' bo rang rang yul gyi bye brag la// mthu zhan yid kyis gsal bar bstan pa bzhin// lus 'di
366a6(mdo 'grel): srog dang bral na mthu med cing // rang gi dgos pa sgrub pa mi mdzes pa// de bzhin shes rab med pas blo gyur na// don sgrub 'jig rten dag na mdzes pa med// dad la sogs pa'i dbang po'i rnam pa yang // dbang po
366b1(mdo 'grel): gzhan la blo 'dzin shes rab gno// de yi mgon ldan yon tan skyon shes pas// nyon mongs zad pa'i tshul la mkhas par 'gyur// shes rab med na 'bras bu don gnyer la// sbyin pa bdag nyid rnam par dag mi 'gyur// gzhan
366b2(mdo 'grel): don btang ba sbyin pa'i mchog ces gsungs// lhag ma nor spol don gyi sbyor ba yin// shes rab mi gsal rnam par bying 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpas rang gi sha byin na// sman gyi shing lhar rnam par mi rtog par// ma
366b3(mdo 'grel): 'am dma' bar 'gyur ba de la med// de bsdu 'jig rten 'das pa don gyi gzhi// khro med dga' bas phun sum tshogs pa'i sems// sbyin pa chen pos 'gro don bsgrub mos pa// rgyal sras sa yi dang po thob par 'gyur//
366b4(mdo 'grel): de la gnas pa phal cher byang chub tu// mi 'phrog blo 'chung 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur// shes rab mthus brtan lam mchog bde ba des// rim gyis dri med rgyal sraswa sa yang thob// de nas rang bzhin rnam dgra tshul 'chang
366b5(mdo 'grel): zhing // gling bzhi 'khor lo sgyur bar de 'gyur te// rgyal po kun gyi spyib+h+yo sa bka' blang zhing // thub dbang rgyal ba bzhin dus mchod par 'gyur// de dag yan chud 'dod pa'i lha ris dang // 'jig rten b+har bu stong gnyis stong gsum
366b6(mdo 'grel): gyi// dbang phyug thob 'gyur de dag yan chad ngu// shes rab 'od kyis rgyu rnams sbyangs pas 'thob// shes rab snang bas mun pa ma bsal na// tshul khrims dag dang ldan par de mi 'gyur// phal cher shes rab med pa
367a1(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims dag/ shes pa'i skyon gyis nyon mongs rnyog bcas 'gyur// rang gi don du tshul khrims ma sgrub na// blo ldan srid pa'i brtson ra'i skyon mthong zhing // de nas 'jig rten ma lus gdon mos
367a2(mdo 'grel): bdasrid pa'i don du mi sgrub smos ci dgos// shes rab log pa'i skyon gyis sems rnyog na// bzod pa'i yon tan de la gnas ci smos// legs par rtogs la mi dga'i tshul 'chang zhing // yon tan med pa'i rgyun la
367a3(mdo 'grel): grags pa bzhin// shes rab ldan pa rnams la gnod pa dag/ bzod pa'i yon tan yod pas gnod mi 'gyur// shin tu dul ba'i glang po mchog rnams la// las kyi khyad par rnam sang bzod pa bzhin// brtson 'grus
367a4(mdo 'grel): gcig pu byas pa ngal ba'i mtha'// shes rab grogs kyis bstang na don chen 'grub// bsgrub byas rje sA la de yi yon tan 'thob// de las byung ba'i dub pa yongs su sel// mkhas pa rnams la phul du bsngags
367a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing // de las phra zhing zab la gzhan med pas// 'dod pa'i skyon gyis yongs su ma bsgribs pa'i// yid lam drang por shes rab med mi 'gyur// de 'dra'i bsam gtan bde dga' mchog ldan pa// skyon bsags
367a6(mdo 'grel): nyes pa chen pos grags gyur pa'i// lam gol rigs pa'i tshul la brten pa yi// skye bo ma rabs yid la ji ltar 'grub// shes rab tshul la brtson meng blo 'chang na// de yi lta ba yongs su ngag mi 'gyur// de med
367b1(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims mi 'dag de med pas// ting 'dzin mi 'thob sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur// shes rab ldan pa ste skyon las bag byed cing // yon tan tshogs las rgyun du bde 'thob pas// nyon mongs 'gro ba'i
367b2(mdo 'grel): don la rab brtson zhing // yon tan tshogs kyis bde ba'i lam du 'jug/ yang dgra rtogs pas ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// ngag yid lus rnams rnam par dag pa 'grub// dri phyir skyon med mthu dang ldan
367b3(mdo 'grel): gyur pa// 'jig rten phan pa phun sum tshogs la 'jug/ sbyin pas ci 'dod yid bzhin bsgrub pa byed// tshig sman bdud rtsi shin tu gsal ba dang // rgyu med mthu dang ldan pa'i sdom pa yis// gzhan gyi
367b4(mdo 'grel): don la mnyam par kun du spyod// don la thun mongs yang drag bstan byas shing // byams pas de dag yid n-i dbang sgyur te// shes rab stobs kyi 'khor lo thogs med de// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'god par byed// /
367b5(mdo 'grel): shes rab sngon 'gro mthu chen 'di dag gis// byin gyi brlabs shing yongs su bsrungs pas na// 'tsho med du ni 'gro'i 'chi dang smad pa dang // dogs pa'i stobs kyi 'jigs pa nyer mi 'ong // 'jigs pa
367b6(mdo 'grel): thams cad skyon las byung ba ste// shes rab skyon dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pas// ston gyi nam mkha'i sprin tshogs med pa la// nyi 'od gsal ba mun dang mi 'grogs bzhin// nyi ma 'od chen shar bar gyur
368a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du// 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams mun nag gang 'grebs pa// shes rab 'od kyi mthu chen 'byung bas na// thams cad bsal 'gyur ming tsam 'ba' zhig lus// gang la shes rab 'od
368a2(mdo 'grel): chen shar gyur pa// de la bya ba'i lhag ma lus pa med// bskal pa'i mes bsregs 'jig rten bsal ba'i tshe// bsreg bya'i lhag ma yod par brjod med bzhin// snang ba thams cad gcig tu 'dus gyur
368a3(mdo 'grel): kyang // shes rab 'o la smyan tu nyer mi 'gro/ de bas khe chen de las mchog gzhan med// yongs su mnyam pa med pa'ang gzhan med do// shes rab tshul brtson bslab pa bde tshul du// yongs su rdzogs
368a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur tshul khrims zhi bar 'gyur// de bus rang gi mthu rnams kun gtugs te// de 'dra'i shes rab tshul la brtson par bya// phung po khams dang skye mched rgyu dag dang // bden pa'i gnas la som nyir mi 'gyur/
368a5(mdo 'grel): zhing // dus gsum de 'drar bsdus pa'i rigs pa ni// shes rab shin tu sbyangs pa'i yul 'jug yin// shes rab dag sbyongs spyod pa'i rnam pa dag/ yid ches bka' zhing yon tan smad la yang // spyi g.yul
368a6(mdo 'grel): ngo mtshar thob pa'i dbang gyur pas// rgyal sras grags pa chen pos khyab par 'gyur// shin du mthu 'bar shes rab stobs kyi phul// bdud dang dpung bcas tshogs kyis bzod mi nus// shes rab 'ong
368b1(mdo 'grel): kyis de dag mig rmongs pas// de dag mgo ldeg lta bur mos pa med// 'dod pa'i ltas 'phangs mda' la mgo thub pa'i// shes rab go cha sems kyis brtan bgos na// gzugs la sogs pa'i dmag myang tshogs
368b2(mdo 'grel): kyi rnams// gcig pu 'jigs med zil gyi se mnan cing 'gro// mi brtan dang tshul 'jigs shing rtabs pa 'as// glen pa'i drung tshul mya ngan 'dzin pa 'am// mthu gzhan sems lnga rtsa bzug gyur pa'i// khro dang chug
368b3(mdo 'grel): dang dman zil gnon pa 'am// phan byed rnams la 'jungs pa'i dri ma dag/ 'did chags ldan la rten 'cha rgong pa 'am// gzi brjid mthu chung le lo'i byasam pa dang // shin tu g.yeng bas mi zhi 'char tshul dag/ sa so
368b4(mdo 'grel): rkyen g+hi bsnam pa thibs po la// gnas 'cha' nyes pa'i rnam pa de dang de// 'gro la phan don dem bcas shes rab can// shes rab chen pos ma lus yongs su sel// skyon bral brtan zhing dang des de mkhyen nas// dga'
368b5(mdo 'grel): byede skyid phyir legs par de gzigs shing // dbang bskur bdud rtsi shin tu sim byed pas// thub dbang rnams kyis de ni dbang yang bsgyur// bde gshegs mdzod spu mtshan rab mthon pa yi// 'od chen zla ba gsal bzhin
368b6(mdo 'grel): sim byed pas// rgyal sras nga yi mgo nas dbang bskur ni// mchod sbyin me la mar khus blugs ltar mdzes// chos rgyal rgyal tshab thabs de thob gyur nas// phyogs bcu kun du sprul pa'i lus skye zhing // sprin chen char
369a1(mdo 'grel): gyi rgyun gyis rdul bsal bzhin// 'jig rten sdug bsngal lhun gyis grub par spel// rgyal sras mthu mchog de 'dra rmad byung dag/ thams cad shes rab de yi mthu las byung // bu la byams pa'i ma 'dra
369a2(mdo 'grel): shes rlab las// de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'byung ci mtshar gyi// bde gshegs stobs bcu stobs kyi phul byung ba// mtshungs med mchog tu bya ba thams cad dang // yon tan tshogs gzhan ma lus thams cad kyang //
369a3(mdo 'grel): dra'i shes rab rgyu las rten cing 'byung // 'jig rten dag na sgyu rtsal gtur mchog dang // gtsug lag mig 'dra ci snyad yod pa dang // yongs su skyab byeng blo dang sngags la sogs// rnam bkod chos kyi khyad par tha
369a4(mdo 'grel): dad dang // rnam grangs rnam mang rnam thar sgo dag dang // 'jig rten phan pa'i rnam pa de dang nges// rgyal sras mthu chen rnam par ston byed pa// de dag thams cad shes rab mthu las byung // dbang po yul rnams lha
369a5(mdo 'grel): rdzas 'dra ba dag pa'i// rgyal srid che ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag/ rang bzhin tshul min 'gyur ba med pa yang // shes rab yon+ya tan blon po ldan pa'i mthu// gzhan la phan byed ro gcig byams pa la// 'dod chun
369a6(mdo 'grel): mgo ba yongs su spangs pa dang // gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod snying rje la// mya ngan khur gyi le los mi dma' dang // dga' mchog dang ldan yang ngag g.yeng meng dang // 'gro don mi g.yel btang snyoms chen po
369b1(mdo 'grel): dang // yon tan de dang de dag gnyen po'i lam// shes rab chen pos bkag pas rnam par mdzes// bsam pa bag la nyal la bka' btsan pa'i// shes rab nyi 'od 'bar lta dri med na// su zhig yun ring 'jig rten
369b2(mdo 'grel): rkyen 'byung ba'i// rang bzhin tshul gyur sran nag sel nus yod// bArtan 'os bla ma rim gro basbyin bkur te// shes rab sgrub phyir thos pa brtul bar bya// rnam pa sum cu gnyis kyis shes bya ste// yang dag mnyam gzhag
369b3(mdo 'grel): yid kyis rnam par sel// thos nyung dmus long bsgom pa'i tshul mi shes// de med dre sA ko ci zhig bsam par bya// de bas thos la brtson de rgyu las// bsam bzhin bsgom pas shes rab yangs pa 'byung // dri brtsod med
369b4(mdo 'grel): sgo dang brtan pa dang // don tshol rtogs pa'i mthu yod rtogs pa dang // bsam gtan de yi yon tan skyed pa bas// shes rab bsgrub la mngon par brtson par bya// shes rab thob pa'i tshul la thabs kyi mdo// bsam gtan
369b5(mdo 'grel): de don nges pa'i thos mang ba// yon tan tshogs rgyu shes rab snang ba ni// gnyis po dI las btsubs shing me ltar 'byung // mkhas pa'i skye bos spyod pa'i lamra bsten te// gti mug rgyur gyur thibs po spang bar bya//
369b6(mdo 'grel): de bsgribs gyur na zla ba shar gyur kyang // char sprin cher bsgribs mi snang mtshungs mi snang // le lo snyoms dang rton ngan rten pa dang // go nyid kyi dbang gyur mi rtog ngang tshul dang // thub pa'i ye shes mchog la
370a1(mdo 'grel): mos med dang // log pa'i nga rgyal non pas don 'dri dang // dma' sems dag la zhen pas byung ba'i rgyus// mkhas pa'i skye bo bsten par ma dang dang // log pa'i rnam rtog dus tshe log lha drag/
370a2(mdo 'grel): gti mug rgyu yin de bsal gnyen po ni// phung po khams dang skye mched bden pa dang // rig pa dag dang rgyu byung tshul brtag dang // chos lnga mkhas pa'i rnam pa de dag ni// shes rab thabs kyi yul brgyad rnam pa yin//
370a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs rnams dbu ba'i tshogs 'dra snying po med// tshor ba rnam gsumA chu yi chu bur tshul// 'du shes 'dod pa'i yon tan zhugs pa ni// smig rgyus ri dgas sku bzhin byis pa slu// 'du byed rnam pa chu shing rang bzhin
370a4(mdo 'grel): 'dra// sgyu ma'i tshul las rnam shes gtad pa med// de la rten cing ro 'dra'i lus 'di nyid// rnam mang bskyod cing lam rgyud kun tu 'khyam// bdag dang bdag gi 'di la gang yang med// mi gtsang sna tshogs 'dus pa'i
370a5(mdo 'grel): tshogs 'di ste// rang dbang yod ltar 'khrul 'khor byas pa bzhin// sems can 'du shes byis pa spro ba byed// migo 'di skad cig 'jig ste bdag ma yin// mig ldan de min mig la bdag kyang med// bdag la mig
370a6(mdo 'grel): med skye mtshad lhag ma yang // de dang tshul 'dra gtang mong bdag gi med// lus la gnas pa'i khams dang phyi rol khams// mtshan nyid mi mtshungs 'gal ba gang yang med// rnam shes khams kyang mi rtag bdag
370b1(mdo 'grel): mA yin/ de las gzhan yang na mkha'i me tog bzhin// de ltar 'di ni sred mongasu yid wAn+d+ra la// sdug+sa bsngal 'brur zhig byung bar gyur pa yin// srad dang bral ma ni ba'i mchog thob ste// tshul khrims ting 'dzin sred
370b2(mdo 'grel): sel lam yang 'thob// de dang de dag rten 'brel byung ba zhes// lta ba rnam dgra yod med gnyis mi dmigs// 'gro ba 'di dag de la sgyu ltar snang // de phyir byede la sogs pas 'gyur meng brtan// 'das gyur byung
370b3(mdo 'grel): gyur rtog pa log lta ste// byung gyur grang yin sring la su bde 'gyur zhes// de ltar 'das pa'i yul la 'dod bral zhing // byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur la smon pa med// sdug bsngal tshul gyis mngon par mi badri zhing
370b4(mdo 'grel): mi bgyid mig phye mngon pa'i tshul yod na// de dag don pa sgrubs phong sgyu de 'i tshul bsams shing // shes ldan sa zhig dgar gnas rtswa snum sems// de ltar rnam grol blo ldan snying dz+nyA can// 'gro ba mgon
370b5(mdo 'grel): med nyon mongs gzir mthong na// thams cad byang chub mchog la ma bkod ste/ dma' lus byams bting mya ngan 'dir mi mos// 'jig rten don
370b6(mdo 'grel): sgrub tshul la mthu med pa'i// theg pa gnyis po gtan du spang byas shing // thub rgyal theg pa snying rjes bstan pa'i lam// gzhan phan ro gcig rang bzhin de dag 'jug/ dma' 'os tshul la legs
371a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i blo mi gzhol// cha lnga che min+da nam yang gnas mi 'gyur// gtsang ma'i rang bzhin gtsang dang rtag tu 'brel// gzhan yang mthun dang / mthun gyur chos nyid tshul// byade dang mi bde rmi lam 'drar
371a2(mdo 'grel): 'drangs shing // gti mug sbyin gyis dma' ba'i 'gro mthong na// las kyi dam pa gzhan dga' bor zhing // rang gi don la de ko ci ste brtson// gang zhig 'jig rten phyir kun spyod cing // mngon pa'i nga rgyal bdag lha yongs
371a3(mdo 'grel): spangs te// kun la byams pas mi gnyis lam rgyu bya// de ni mya ngan 'das kyang 'jig rten spyod// shes rab rnam dag mngon sgrub theg pa'i mchog/ thub chen thams cad mkhyen nyid de las 'byung // de ni 'jig rten
371a4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi mig bzhin te// 'od ldan nyi ma shar ba'i 'od dang 'dra// 'khor ba'i skyon gyis khur gyis ngal chad kyang // shes rab rnam par dbye la skyon med pa// de ni sangs rgyas legs sgrub theg pa la/
371a5(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba med// bde gshegs mthu can rmad byung mthong 'gyur byaso// yan lag thams cad spu ga yo dga' 'gyur cing /
371a6(mdo 'grel): de sgrub theg pa'i dam po spongs byed pa// g.yo rgyu spyod min rgyu ni gzhan med do// bdud kyis 'khrugs pas ma non su zhig ko//
371b1(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog gsum gyis 'byung gnas theg pa ste// gnod pa'i mda' 'byin bde gshegs theg pA la// skyod par su byed de ni 'gro ba'i dgra/ shes rab sdig zums 'grus
371b2(mdo 'grel): 'khrur gyur pa la// dkon mchog gsum gyis 'byung gnas theg pa ste// gnod pa'i mnga' 'byin bde gshegs theg pa la// smod par su byed de ni 'gro ba'i dgye/ shes rab
371b3(mdo 'grel): mi go zlums 'gro sna 'khrur gyur bya la// 'jig rten don sgrub rgyal ba'i rgyal rigs na// snying rje mi skyed skyes bu gang zhig yod// de dag rmyangs gsal brtson 'grus su mi rtsom// shes
371b4(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lo'u'o// / pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus po A shU ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// lo tsa
371b5(mdo 'grel): a tsan b+he d+d+hoHnai rok+Shi tas bsgyur ba'o// shuH// bkra shis/ bkris dpal 'bar 'jam greng rgyan du byam/ dge'o//
371b6(mdo 'grel): sarba mang+ga laM//
372a1(mdo 'grel): las dang po pa'i sa sbyang ba dgra las rgyal ba gsang bas mdzad pa bzhugs//
372b1(mdo 'grel): // rgya gar skad du/ ya ti karmi b+h+ra ma~M ka ri pa ri/ bod skad du/ las dang po pa'i sa sbyang pa// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma lta bur gzi ldan sku// sangs rgyas zhabasku la phyag 'tshal te// las
372b2(mdo 'grel): ni dang po pa yis// sbyangs pa'i 'dar ni bshad par bya// lam ma sbyangs pa'i nyes pa dang // lum gyi sbyang ba gang zhe no// lam ma sbyangs pa'i skye bo dag/ byes bgrong ngal drub tsha grang dang // lce dang rtsu ba dang skyo ba dang //
372b3(mdo 'grel): bkres skom gdungs shing brnyas pa dang // 'jigs dang yi mug nyams su myong // mya ngan 'tsher 'gro ba bcas pa dang // kha cig spyi'u tshugs dmyal ba dang // dud 'gro yi dgas rnams su bsten// nor dang bzla'
372b4(mdo 'grel): btung grags pa dag/ 'dod pas byes bgrong sdug bsngal can// re ba 'bras bu med pa dang // sdug dang bral dang mi sdug phrad// mi bzang na rgas 'joms bzhin du// 'chi bdag drung du myur 'gro ba// ma tshor
372b5(mdo 'grel): ga zhar bcas shing rtse// tshe 'di don med myur du 'da'// yang dang yang du skye ba yis// 'khor ba'i nyes pa grags meng bsten// kyi hud lam las nyams pa yi// skye bo dag ni nyam daR+sha gnas// mi bzang mya
372b6(mdo 'grel): ngan 'brog dgon du// lam gol gyur pa dag dang mtshungs// mig ldan lom log 'gro ba ltar// lam las nyams pa'i skye bo smad// de la lam sbyang ba gang zhe na// 'dir las dang po pa'i sa ni lam gyi dang po ste//
373a1(mdo 'grel): de sbyang ba ni dbye ba rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i dkon mchog gsum legs par shes nas phyag 'tshal ba dang // rgya cher mchod pa dang / yon tan brjod pas bstod pa dang // snying thag pa nas skyabs
373a2(mdo 'grel): su 'gro ba dang // rjes su dran pa bsgoms pas bslab pa la slob pas skyabs phun sum tshogs pa yin// mi dge ba bcu'i nyes pa shes pa dang / dge ba bcu'i yon tan shes pa dang / dge ba bcu'i sdom pa len pa dang /
373a3(mdo 'grel): rnangs pa sgyur mi garjod bya dang / yan 'ag nyams na sadA nI sna bzhin du/ 'tshos pas sdom pa la gnas pa yin// byang chub sems kyi phan yon lags pa shes pa dang / d+hi skye ba'i rtsa l-I gnas pa dang / mas
373a4(mdo 'grel): de yang dag par bskyed pa dang / bskyed pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ring du spong ba dang / sems de 'phel zhing mi brjod pa'i chos la gnas pas byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yin pas/ de ltar chos rnam pa gsum
373a5(mdo 'grel): la rnam pa bco lngar phye ba 'di ni 'dir sa sbyang ba'i gzhi dang / rten+da dang / gnas zhes bya'o// de gzhi de lta bu la brten nas/ lam gyi dngos gzhi gang // ji ltar sbyang zhe na/ gzhi de dag la legs par gnas pas
373a6(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems blang ba byas nas/ ji ltar blangs pa'i sdom pa las mi 'da' bar byams pa tshad med pa bsgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom zhing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas
